https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larawan_Sala

Ing Sala ning Larawan o keng amanung English Image resolution sasabian ne ing
butiltil a laman a tatalnan ning larawan. Ing kataya magagamit yang parepareu
kareng digital a larawan, film a larawan, ampong aliwa pang larawan. Ustung
matas ya ing resolusiun (kalamnan ning larawan) ing buri nang sabian mas dakal
ing detalia keng larawan.

Ing resolusion ning larawan maliari yang sukdan keng dakal a paralan. Deng
Resolusiun a units maliari lang mitaid kareng physical a sukad. (alimbawa gulis
balang mm, gulis balang pulgada) o kaya ing pangkabilugan a sukad ning litratu
(gulis balang katas ning litratu, kebaluan mu rin bilang gulis mu, o kaya gulis
TV). Dakal pa, deng gulis paris ila keraklan deng magagamit imbes kabud na
gulis. Ing paris a gulis metung yang paris a mileleng masala ampong madalumdum a
gulis, kaba naman ing masala ampong madalumdum a gulis mabibilang lang pareu.
Ing resolusiun a 10 gulis ing mangabaldugan yang 10 gulis balang millimetru,
mangabaldugan a 5 madalumdum a gulis at liliwas la reng 5 masalang gulis, o kaya
5 gulis a paris balang millimetru. Deng Photographic lens ampong film resolution
keraklan mayayaus lang paris balang millimetru.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lagaring_pamutut

Ing lagaring pamutut (crosscut saw king Ingles) pangkabilugan yang terminu para
king sanumang taram lagaring pamutut king grain ning dutung a pakurus, patikdo o
pabakle king grain ning dutung. Malyari lang maging malati o maragul deng
lagaring pamutut, a maki ipan a sigi-sigi o lapit-lapit para king mapinung obra
antimo ing pamanigobra king dutung, o maragul para king pamamutut trosu. Iti
malyari yang kasangkapang gamat, o kasangkapang de kuryenti.

Maka-anggulu ya king ayus a liwas-liwas (alternating pattern) ing gilid nang
pamutut (cutting edge) ning balang ipan. Uli ning disenyung anti kaniti, ing
balang ipan malyari yang kimut antimong taram ning kutsilyu, at mangili ya king
dutung, e anti king lagaring panistis, a gigisi katulid ning grain, antimong
malating pat. Deng aliwang lagaring pamutut ating lang espesyal a ipan a ausan
dang "rakers" a midisenyu ba rong linisan ampong ilako deng pira-pirasu o
putut-putut a dutung ibat manibat king kerf. Mas mangalati la ipan deng lagaring
pamutut kesa kareng lagaring panistis.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurdistan

Ing Kurdistan ((makiramdam) (help·info) "Labwad da reng Kurd"; a ausan da mu
namang Curdistan kanita; laun a lagyu: Corduene) metung yang e makaing malino
pamigulis a labwad nung nu deng Kurds ing manimunang mayorya ning
populasyun,[mangailangangan yang sitas/suporta] at nung nu la makabasi deng
Kurdish a kultura, amanu, ampong pamikilalang pambangsa king kasalesayan.

King kasalungsungan a pamangamit, ing Kurdistan mangabaldugan yang deng mapilan
a dake ning albugang Turkey (Turkish Kurdistan), pangulung Iraq (Iraqi
Kurdistan), pangulu albugang Iran (Iranian Kurdistan) ampong [pangulu]]ng Syria
(Western Kurdistan) nung nu deng Kurd ing manimunang manuknangan. Halus katulid
ne ning Kurdistan ing labwad a bibilugan da rengpangulu albugan ning kabundukan
a Zagros ampong aslagan ning kabundukan a Taurus mountain ranges, at miraras ya
kareng dake ning Armenia.

Minuna yang mika kabilyan a autonomous (maki sariling pamanibala) king
pamikasundu anyang 1970 king kapamahalan a Iraqi, at mekumpirma yang pasibayu
ing kayang kabilyan antimong labwad a autonomous kilub ning pederal a
republikang Iraqi anyang 2005. Ating lalawigan a maki lagyung Kurdistan king
Iran; ala yang sariling pamanibala.

Asakup de reng Kurd a lalaban king Gerang sibil king Syria ing maragul a dake
ning pangulu aslagan ning Syria kabang minurung la reng pwersang kakampi nang
al-Assad ba lang lumaban kareng aliwang lugal. Uling atátag de ing sarili rang
kapamahalan, minyad lang autonomia king demokratikung Syria deng aliwang Kurd;
den namang aliwa, kapagnasan dang mitátag magsarili o independienting Kurdistan.

Bisa lang mitikdong mágsariling bangsang estadung (nation state) Kurdistan deng
aliwang agumang nasyonalistang Kurdish, a bibilugan da reng aliwa o ing sablang
lugal a keraklan Kurdish, kabang deng aliwa naman, mangampanya la para king
karagdagang autonomiyang Kurdish kilub da reng kasalukuyang angganan da reng
bangsa.

Template:Kurdish nationalist organisations Coordinates: 37°00′N 43°00′E﻿ / ﻿37,
43



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katherine_Mansfield

I Kathleen Mansfield Murry (14 Octubre 1888 – 9 Enero 1923) metung yang
pikabaluan a modernistang talasulat ning makuyad a paniulat a pikudta (short
fiction) a mibait at meragul king New Zealand aniang sakup ne pa ning Bretaña,
at sínulat king lalam ning talipampan a Katherine Mansfield, a makuyad a porma
ning kayang tutung lagiu, uling mibait yang Katherine Mansfield Beauchamp. Meko
ya i Mansfield papunta king Gran Bretaña aniang 1908, at karin, akilala no reng
talasulat a Modernista kalupa nang D.H. Lawrence ampong Virginia Woolf, a megi
nang malapit a kaluguran. Maralas, dudurut la reng kayang makuyad a salita
kareng penandit ning kaguluan (moments of disruption), at pane, bigla ing
karelang pangabuklat. Kayabe la kareng kilalang dili kareng kayang gewa deng
"The Garden Party," "The Daughters of the Late Colonel," ampong "The Fly."
Aniang Mumunang Guerrang Pangyatu, mesakit yang tuberculosis i Mansfield, at uli
na niti, e mekapagbalik o ne mekapagbisita king New Zealand, at yang kemate na
king edad a 34.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julian_Assange

I Julian Paul Assange ( /əˈsɑːnʒ/ ə-sahnzh; mibait 3 Julio 1971) metung yang
Australianong periodista, publisher, and Internet activist. Pikabaluan yang dili
antimong talapagsalita ampong sugung talapatuntun (editor in chief) ning
WikiLeaks, metung a whistleblower website (mamalitang karinan-Aptas). Bayu ya
linub king karinan-Aptas, metung yang computer programmer. Mekatuknang ne kareng
miayaliwang bangsa, at migsalita neng mekatapilan tungkul king katimawan ning
pamipahayag, pamag-censor, ampong mapaniasat a pamipahayag (investigative
journalism).

Tetag neng Assange ing karinan-Aptas o website a WikiLeaks aniang 2006 at
magsilbi ya king kayang lupung talapayu (advisory board). Kayabe ya king
pamaglimbag tungkul king pamakamateng e dadalan king ukuman (extrajudicial
killings) king Kenya, a peniambut nang 2009 Amnesty International Media Award.
Miglimbag ya mu naman tungkul king pamanugse makalasun a basura king Africa,
deng manual ning Church of Scientology, kaparalanan king Guantanamo Bay, ampo
reng bancu anti ing Kaupthing ampong Julius Baer. Aniang 2010, miglimbag yang
milihim a detalle tungkul king pangasangkut ning Estados Unidos kareng guerra
king Afghanistan ampong Iraq. Kaibat, aniang 28 Noviembre 2010, milimbag yang
lihim a cableng diplomaticong Americano.ing Wikileaks ampong reng lima nang
ka-socio king media Inaus nong mapanganib ampong mapangangas ning White House
deng dapat nang Assange.

Para king obra na king WikiLeaks, tinggap neng Assange ing 2008 Economist
Freedom of Expression Award ampo ing 2010 Sam Adams Award. Ing Utne Reader inaus
neng metung kareng "25 Visionaries Who Are Changing Your World". Aniang 2010,
ing New Statesman binili ne king ka- 23 kareng "The World's 50 Most Influential
Figures".

Aniang 30 Noviembre 2010, agpang king pamaniad ning Public Prosecution Office
king Gothenburg, Sweden, Interpol mibili ya i Assange king kayang red notice
list of wanted persons; panintunan de kanu bang kutnan tungkul kareng pamaglabag
a sexual, at kusa yang minta king London Metropolitan Police aniang 7 Diciembre
2010. Tatanggi nong Assange deng sasangkan da kaya.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joey_Marquez

I Joey Marquez (Joey, Tsong), a mibait aniang Octubre 07, 1960 (tubu king
Mabalacat, Pampanga), metung yang comedianti ampong politicu. Pengari na la ri
Artemio Marquez, Sr. ampong Teresita Esguera Perez. Kayabe la kareng kapatad na
di Via Hoffman, Melanie Marquez ampong Babes Marquez. Megi yang alcalde ning
Parañaque Lakanbalen, Filipinas manibat 1995 anggang 2004, at tinagal ya para
king Congreso aniang Mayo 2004 oneng mesambut ya.

Joey was one of the 1986 cast of seven in Palibhasa Lalake, the longest running
sitcom on Philippine Television (spanning 12 successful years), with Richard
Gomez, Gloria Romero, Cynthia Patag, Amy Perez, Carmina Villaroel and Apa
Ongpin. Marquez was included in the S-Files roster of hosts after he
successfully pinch-hit for Paolo Bediones when Paolo went to the US to interview
some famous Hollywood celebrities to be featured on the show. Kayabe ya i Joey
kareng pitung linage king Palibhasa Lalake aniang 1986, ing maluat diling
pepalage rang sitcom king television king Filipinas (a miras 12 banua), kayabe
ya i Richard Gomez, Gloria Romero, Cynthia Patag, Amy Perez, Carmina Villaroel
ampong Apa Ongpin. Miabe ya i Marquez kareng host ning S-Files kaibat nang
menalili kang Paolo Bediones aniang minta ya i Paolo king America ba nong
i-interview deng sikat a artista king Hollywood a ipalage ra king karelang
programa .



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/JPEG_2000

Ing JPEG 2000 metung yang standard ning pamanyiksik larawan o image compression
a basi king wavelet. Lelangan ne ning lupung (committee) a Joint Photographic
Experts Group kanitang banuang 2000 king kapakayan nang alilan ya ing orihinal a
standard a JPEG (a melalang bandang 1991) a basi king discrete cosine transform.
Ing standardized filename extension, .jp2 ya para king ISO/IEC 15444-1
conforming files, at .jpx ya para karing extended part-2 specification, a
mibulalag antimong ISO/IEC 15444-2, kabang ing MIME type, image/jp2 ya.

Mangailangan yang misnang karakal a panaun king pamaglako pangasiksik
(decompression) kesa king JPEG, at paintulutan na ing mas matas a uring
pamanguldas [simpan] (sophisticated progressive downloads), dapot halus pareu
ing panaun da para king pamanyiksik (compression rates). Lalu yang pupulâ ing
HOEG kuntoru mitatas ing pamiyanting pamaniksik (compression rates), imbes na
magpalual kareng "blocking and ringing" artifacts ning JPEG, anian lalung
sasákit ing diretsung pamikumpara da reng karelang bilis ning pamanyiksik
(compression rate).

Mibulalag ya antimong ISO standard, ISO/IEC 15444-1:2000, ing metung a dake ning
JPEG 2000. Aniang banuang 2008, e pa maleparan ing pamangamit da reng web
browser king JPEG 2000, ania e pa pangkabilugan ing pamangamit kaniti king World
Wide Web.

Lipat ning gínawa nong paralan ba lang ibage deng miyayaliwang uri da ring
meta-data, king salukuyan, ala pang matatanggap a paralan ba yang ilangkap
(embed) la reng Exif data, dapot atin nang memunikalang JPEG 2000
"JpgTiffExif->JP2" UUID box bang manyalikut impormasiun, at papaliari ne ning
ExifTool version 6.92 o mas bayu.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ilib

Ing ilib (Imperata cylindrica), a karaniwang mayayaus king Ingles blady grass,
cogon grass ( /koʊˈɡoʊn/), kunai grass ( /ˈkuːnaɪ/), o Japanese bloodgrass,
metung yang species ning grass king genus Imperata. Makabili ya king subfamily
Panicoideae, supertribe Andropogonodae, tribu Andropogoneae.

Metung yang pilmihan (perennial) a rhizomatous a dikut a katutubu king aslagan
ampong mauli-aslagang Asia, India, Micronesia, Australia, ampong aslagan ampong
mauling Africa. Daragul yang manibat 0.6–3 m (2–10 pie) kátas. Maki lapad lang
manga 2 cm malapit king pun ning tanaman, at kikitid anggang matilus ya karas
king babo; mapinu lang tabas ipan deng lele ning bulung, at maki matilus lang
kristal a silica. Ing manimunang uyat mas maputla ya kesa king aliwa nang dake
ning bulung, at mas malapit ya king metung a talindiking ning bulung. Mabwak ya
ing babo ning bulung malapit king pun, kabang itang lalam keraklan ala yang
bwak. Miraras lang anggang 1.2 metru lalam deng kayang uyat o yamut, oneng
keraklan 0.4 m la mu king gabun a mabalas.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hezbollah

Ing Hezbollah (حزب الله‎ Ḥizbu 'llāh, literal a kabaldugan, "Partidu nang Allah"
o "Partidu ning Dios") — malyari mu namang transliterated Hizbullah, Hizballah,
etc. — metung yang grupung militanting Muslim a Shi'a ampong partidung pulitikal
a makabasi king Lebanon. Tatanggap yang saup a pampulitika ampong pinansyal king
Iran ampong Syria, at ing dake nang paramilitary tuturing deng pangimut a
pangresistensyaking mabilug a yatung Arabu ampong Muslim. Para kareng
kapamahalan ning Estados Unidos, ing Netherlands, Bahrain, France, U.K.,
Australia, Canada, ampong Israel, metung yang aguman o organisasyun a terorista
ing Hezbollah, king kabilugan o metung a dake na niti. Aisipan deng itikdo deng
paring Muslim, at pinonduan ne ning Iran kaybat ning pamanyakup ning Israel king
Lebanon anyang 1982, at mitátag ya bayu ing sabla bang lumaban king pamanyakup
ning Israel. Kinangwa lang inspirasyun deng kayang pekapun kang Ayatollah
Khomeini, at senayan nala at inorganisa ning metung a tropa da reng Iranian
Revolutionary Guards.

Template:Arab-Israeli Conflict Template:Lebanese political parties
Template:Syrian civil war[[af:ezbollah [[nl:Hezbollah}



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guip%C3%BAzcoa

Ing Guipúzcoa (Kastila) o Gipuzkoa (Basque ampong official) metung yang
lalawigan ing Basque Country, king Espanya.

Ing sepu na ilapin deng lalawigan ning Biscay ampong Álava, ing Autonomous
Community ning Navarre, ing French Departamentu ning Pyrénées-Atlantiques,
ampong ing Bay ning Biscay.

Ing kayang lualas a 1,980 km² ( sq mi) maging yang pekamalating lalawigan ning
Espanya. Ing lalawigan a iti a tin yang balen.

682,977 (2002) ya ing kayang popluasyun, nung nu mga kapat a dake atiu king
tungku, ing San Sebastián. Deng aliwang mayalagang balen ilapin deng Irun,
Errenteria, Zarautz, Arrasate, Oñati (mikamautang university), Eibar, Tolosa
(king makuyad a panaun iti ing meging tungku ning lalawigan), Beasain, Pasaia
(ing pun pantalanthe), Hondarribia (ing metung a kuta sumangid ning France)

Ing Gipuzkera metung yang dialetu ning Basque a amanu nung nu magagagmit ya king
alus labuad, at makanyan mu rin kareng makalapit antimo ing Navarre. Ing
pintaksi iyapin ing Ignatius ning Loyola, nung nu mibait ya kareng siping ning
Loyola king balen ning Azpeitia.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_Street_View

Ing Google Street View metung ya kareng bageng yampang ning Google Maps ampo
ning Google Earth a babie bista o pamagbationg (views) 360° a pakera
(horizontal) ampong 290° patikdo (vertical) a maleparan (panoramic) ibat king
dane da reng puestu king dalan (manga metung balang 10 o 20 metru) para kareng
dakal a dalan king yatu, ibat king kátas a 2.5 metru. Inumpisan de aniang Mayo
25, 2007, at bagia bagia, miragdagan la reng kayabeng lakanbalen o ciudad, at
kareng lakanbalen a reti, karagdagan a dalan, bukud kareng lugal a marangle.
King salukuyan, ating larawan para king Estados Unidos, United Kingdom, Czech
Republic, Francia, Italia, Mexico, Netherlands, Portugal, Espania, Suiza,
Canada, Japan, Taiwan, Australia, ampong New Zealand. Maliari palto ing
pangayabe (coverage) kapamilatan ning pamag-drag king "pegman" ibat king kayang
puestu, papunta king mapa ning sanu mang sukad.

Ing kukua kareng papakit nang larawan ning Google Street metung yang grupu da
reng coching Chevrolet Cobalt, Saturn Astra o Toyota Prius king Pangulung
America, Opel Astra king Europa, Holden Astra king Australia ampong New Zealand,
Toyota Prius king Japan, Fiat Stilo king Brazil, [[Toyota Vitz|Toyota Yaris]king
South Africa ampong Pontiac G5 king Mexico. Mapaliaring e la kayabe deng
daralanan da reng taung lalakad (pedestrian areas), mangakitid a dalan ampong
esquinita da reng parque a e ra aluban deng cochi. Nanupata, neng kai, gagamit
lang Google Trike (tricycle). King balang metung kareng coching deti (ampo reng
tricycle) ating siam a directional camera para kareng pamagbationg 360°, GPS
para king ustung pamagpuestu, atlung laser range scanner, a gewa ning SICK, para
king pamaniukad angga king 50 metru 180° king arap ning saken. Atin muring
3G/GSM/Wi-Fi antenna kareng cochi para king pamag-scan 3G/GSM ampong Wi-Fi
hotspot. Bayu-bayu pamu, makabasi la reng matas kalinawan a larawan (high
quality images) kareng open source hardware camera ibat king Elphel. Gagamitan
na la murin ning Google book search deng camerang deti.

Nung maliari, lalto la reng larawan ning mayayakit king dalan lagpus king
pekamatas a level ning pamag-zoom kareng mapa ampong letratung satellite, ampo
kapamilatan ning pamg[drag king "pegman" king metung a puestu. Kapamilatan ning
keyboard o mouse, maliari yang pilinan ing direccion ning pamaglaweng pakera
ampong patikdo, at pati ing zoom level. Papakit ne ning matulid o maki patad
(broken) a gulis king letratu, maliari yang akit ing mitantiang delanan ning
coching maki caera; ating aduang arrow o paslung makasuglung king tutuking
letratu king balang metung a direccion. Kareng salapungan dalan (junction)
ampong lilipatan (crossings) kareng daralanan da reng coching maki camera, mas
dakal la reng paslu.

Aniang Noviembre 21, 2008, miragdag ya ing Street View king Maps application a
maka-install kareng anggang Apple iPhone. Kanitang Diciembre 10, 2008, miragdag
ya ing Street View king Maps application para king S60 3rd Edition. Miragdag ya
murin ing Street View kareng bersion ning Google Maps para king Windows Mobile
ampong BlackBerry. Miyabe ya murin ing Street View kareng anggang bersion ning
Google Maps para king Android, at maliari yang gamitan ing digital compass bang
lumawe king paligid da reng lugal.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloria_Macapagal-Arroyo

Y Arroyo mi-angat yang panga-Pamuntuk (presidency) inyang 2001 pauli na ning
EDSA II Revolution a mituag kang Joseph Estrada keng luklukan pauli ning parsala
da kaya keng e mangayap a gawa antimong laganap a lagayan. Y Arroyo Philippine
general election, 2004 me-alal yang pasibayu inyang 2004, simbut ne ing artista
Fernando Poe, Jr.

Inyang 2005, Y Arroyo mepili yang pang-apat a pekamasikan a babai keti yatu a
linimbag ning Forbes magazine.

Y Arroyo mibait yang Gloria Macaraeg Macapagal karing pengaring Diosdado
Macapagal and Evangelina Macaraeg. 14 ya pang banua inyang ing tatang na meging
yang pamuntuk ning bansang Filipinas. Megaral ya Assumption Convent para keng
mababang pipagaralan, at meyari yang valedictorian inyang 1964. Ikua ne ing
Bachelor of Arts degree na king Economics king Assumption College, nung nu ya
mig-graduate magna cum laude inyang 1968.

Megaral yang aduang banua i Arroyo king Georgetown University School of Foreign
Service king Washington, D.C. nung nu ne akaklasi y US President Bill Clinton.
Pangabalik na Filipinas, sindu na ing kayang pamagaral, at kinanwa yang Master's
Degree in Economics king Ateneo de Manila University at Doctorate Degree in
Economics king University of the Philippines.

Y Arroyo ay-asawa ne y Jose Miguel Arroyo inyang 1968. Atlu la reng anak da, ila
di, Juan Miguel (mibait 1969), Evangelina Lourdes (mibait 1971), at Diosdado
Ignacio Jose Maria (mibait 1974).

Manibat 1977 anggang 1987, tinuru ya i Arroyo kareng miyayaliwang pipagaralan at
tinalan miyayaliwang posisyun, lalu na keng sikat a University of the
Philippines ampong king Ateneo De Manila University. Ya murin ing meging
pamuntuk king Economics Department ning Assumption College.

Inyang 1987 inagkat neng President Corazon Aquino bang maki-anib keng gobyernu
bilang Assistant Secretary of the Department of Trade and Industry. Meging yang
Undersecretary kaibat ning aduang banua. Kayagnan na nita, meging yang Executive
Director of the Garments and Textile Export Board, y Arroyo ikit na ing mabilis
a pamagluid ning garment industry inyang 1980s.

Agiang ing igpa na sinuyu ya bilang pamuntuk ning Pilipinas, y Arroyo eya linub
king politika anggang inyang 1992, aduang pulu't pitong banua kaybat linual ya'y
tatang na keng opisina. Meyalal ya king Senadu Philippine Senate inyang 1992 at
meyalal yang pasibayu inyang 1995, menikua yang pekamarakal a botu keng
senatorial elections 'alus mga 16 million a botu.

Inyang 1998, pigunam na sinaguli na tagal ya bilang pamuntuk (presidente) oneng
inadlukan neng President Fidel V. Ramos na makiabe kareng pakalukluk a Partidu
Lakas LAKAS Party bilang maging kaduang pamuntuk (vice-president), House Speaker
Jose De Venecia. De Venecia at y Arroyo mengampanya la mabilug a kapulungan a
mamantabe ya y Ramos ampo ing masikan ng makineria ning LAKAS. Menyabut ya y
Arroyo bilang kaduang pamuntuk (vice-president) migit kumulang mga 13 million
botu, maigit dobli keng botu ning pekamalapit ng kalaban, Senator Edgardo
Angara. Oneng y De Venecia mesambut ya kang vice president, Joseph Estrada a
sikat at kasalungsungan a makalukluk.

Migumpisa ya y Arroyo bilang Kaduang Pamuntuk (Vice President) inyang June 30,
1998. King maliguang panaun, y Estrada, tilduan ne keng Kabinete bilang
Secretary of the Department of Social Welfare and Development, nung nu ing
mumunang obligacion na ing lawen na ing programa na ning gobiernu para kareng
pakakalulu.

Tiniwalag ya keng kabinete inyang Oktubre 2000, kewani ne ing sarili na kang
President Estrada, a parasalanan da keng lagayan itang dati ng talasuyu.Y Arroyo
mikiabe ya keng civil society at dakal a Filipino king pamanyaus da king
presidente a kuldas ne keng luklukan.

Inyang January 20, 2001, mapilan a aldo kaibat na ning kagulu'an pampulitika
ampong protesta king dalan, Ing Supreme Court sinabi na na ing luklukan Pamuntuk
vacanti ya. Mumuna pa nita ing military at ing national police minatras no
supporta kang Estrada at binie ra ing supporta kang Arroyo. Sinumpa neng Supreme
Court Chief Justice Hilario Davide Jr y Arroyo inyang aldong ita bilang ika
labing apat (14th) a pamuntuk ning Pilipinas.

Ing pangatalsik ng Estrada mebalu yang bilang EDSA II, kaibat ning EDSA
Revolution ning 1986 a migpababa king pamanungkulan ng Ferdinand Marcos. Ing
EDSA ila reng mumuna ng titik para keng dalan a Epifanio de los Santos Avenue,
metung a malapad a dalan king keragulan a Menila a nung nu milyari ing maragul a
demonstration laban kang Estrada.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eminem

I Marshall Bruce Mathers III (mibait Octubre 17, 1972), a mas kilala king kayang
talipampan a Eminem ampo ing kayang alter egong Slim Shady, Americany yang
rapper, record producer, talasulat kanta ampong artista. Bukud king kayang
solung karera, kayanib ya i Eminem king kayang grupung D12, ampong kapitna king
hip hop duong Bad Meets Evil, kayabe ya i Royce da 5'9". I Eminem ing metung
kareng best-selling a musikeru at ya ing masaling diling musikeru ning 2000s.
Milista neng metung kareng mapyang diling artist king kabilugan ning panaun deng
dakal a magasin, kayabe ya ing Rolling Stone a migbili kaya king ka-82 king
listaan nang The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time. Inaus ne muring The King of
Hip Hop ning magasin a iti. Nung iyabe ya ing obra na kayabe ya ing D12 ampo ing
Bad Meets Evil, Eminem menikwa neng apulung number-one album king Billboard 200.
Antimong solung musikeru, mekapisali neng maygit 100 milyung album king mabilug
a yatu. King Estados Unidos, mekapisali neng 49.1 milyung album ampong
42 milyung track.

Template:Eminem Template:Eminem singles Template:Shady Records
Template:Aftermath Entertainment Template:Hip hop



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emilio_Aguinaldo

Y Emilio Aguinaldo y Famy (Marsu 22, 1869—Pebreru 6, 1964) metung yang Filipinu
general, politicu, at pinunung panga-katimawan. Y Aguinaldo yang meging susi
ning pamag-aklas ning Pilipinas laban king España at king Guerang
Filipinu-American salang keng pamaniakup ning America.

King Filipinas, y Aguinaldo kilalanan de bilang mumunang pamuntuk, agiang ing
kayang panga-pamuntuk ere kilalanan deng aliuang bangsa.

Inyang 1895, y Aguinaldo mikiabe ya ka reng Katipunan, a makasalikut a aniban
nung nu ing manimunu kanita y Andrés Bonifacio a ing pake ra ing apalakuan la
reng Kastila at ing panga-timawa ning Filipinas. Mikiabe ya bilang tinyenti
lalam ng Hen. Baldomero Aguinaldo at mitas yang ranku a heneral kilub namu ning
ditak a bulan. Ing panga-anib na ka reng Katipunan, sinopan ne ing Filipinas
siniklab ing aklasan laban ka reng Kastila inyang 1896. Dakal ya penyambut ka
reng balen king Lalawigan ning Cavite, pansamantala mu at apalakuan do keng
lugal deng Kastila. Inyang y Bonifacio linual ya keng pangasalikut na inyang
March 1897 at sibukan ng pakit ing kayang panga-pinunu, y Aguinaldu peparakap
ne. Kaibat na nita pepapate ne inyang May 10, 1897.

Pauli na ning merakal at mesikan ing pamanyugud da ding Kastila, mepilatan lang
minurung king bunduk reng kawal Katipunan. Inyang December 14, 1897, ding aduang
milalaban mikasundu la kapamiltan ning Biak-na-Bato. Lalam ning kasunduan di
Aguinaldu at 34 a aliwa pang pinunu mibayaran lang 400,000 pesos, y Aguinaldu at
34 aliwa pang pinunu ning aklasan kusa deng likuan ing bangsa papuntang Hong
Kong. Y Aguinaldu tinggap ne ing aluk, dapot eya migdatun Hong Kong at ginamit
no ring pera para panyaling sandata para kareng Filipinung magaklas. Deng
makatuki ila ding pinunu ning Supreme Council a saksi at linawe king kasunduan
ning Biak-na -Bato. Y Emilio Aguinaldo iyang pamuntuk at y Mariano Trias, ing
kaduang pamuntuk. Ding aliwang pinunu ila pin di Antonio Montenegro para
pandayung pisasabian, Isabelo Artacho para pangkilub, Baldomero Aguinaldo para
keng Kayamanan , and Emiliano Riego para pang-Guerra.

Y Aguinaldo mibalik ya Filipinas May 1898. Pangauli na tambing na nang sindu ing
kayang pamagaklas laban ka reng Kastila, ngeni tatanggap sikan lub kareng
Amricanu.

Inyang 1898, megumpisa ing Kastila-Americanung Guerra at y Aguinaldo inaus na la
reng Americanung officiales at mamasa yang sopan de keng kayang pamagsikap para
katimawan. Inyang mumuna samutsamut ing akakua ng signus, dapot sindu na pa mu
ring ing pamagkampi na ka reng Americanu. Kambe na nini sinuku na la reng arakap
nang 15,000 a kawal a Kastila at inabut na la kang Admiral Dewey. Nanupata, ing
karelang pamiugne malabug at era ikit ing taimtim dand nasa ding Aremicanung
dinan dong katimwan deng Filipinu. Ing marok pa nita megumpisa lang maniukup
gabun deng Americanu. Y Aguinaldo pepasiag na ing Katimawan ning Filipinas
inyang inyang June 12, 1898 [1]. Ing Philippine Constitutional Convention inalal
neng bilang Pamuntuk inyang January 1, 1899.

Inyang bengi ning Pebrero 4, 1899, itang Aericanung bante berilan ne ing
Filipinu kabang lilipat ya keng tete ning San Juan. Ining mepalyaring iti ya ing
umpisa ning Guerrang Filipinu-americanu, kaibat na nita sinaguli mika labanan
kareng Americanu at kareng maka katimawan a Filipinu. Ding mangasikan dang
sandata ding Americanu ilang mitabi king siudad kareng kawal Filipinu at ing
gubiernung Malolos mengailangan yang magpalipat-lipat.

Y Aguinaldo menimunu yang lalaban ka reng Americanu inyang maniakup la at
minurung ya king pangulung Luzon at deng Americanu atsu la't tutuki king kayang
gisgas. Merakap ya king Palanan, Isabela inyang March 23, 1901. Ing mekarakap
yapin y US General Frederick Funston, nung nu la a abaligo ri Aguinaldu inayang
magpanggap la mong susuku ding Americanu kareng Filipinu.

Inyang dakpan ne y Aguinaldu, y Funston apagumasdan na na y Aguinaldu atin yang
masanting a ugali at makatas ya pangatau. Tinggap ng Aguinaldu ing ere paten
nung sumumpa ya king gubiernu ning America. Sinumpa yang maging tapat king
America inyang April 1, 1901, nung nu mitda ing Mumunang Republika at mebisa ya
ing America ing manibala king Filipinas. Ding aliwa sindu da ing laban, dapot
ing pamagsuku ng Aguinaldu ya ing mismung megwakas keng Labanan
Filipinu-Americanu.

Kebalwan na y Aguinaldu mituldu yang aduang primeru ministru inyang yang
manungkulan. Ila ri Apolinario Mabini at Pedro Paterno.

Inyang manungkulan la reng Americanu, y Aguinaldu sindu na ing nasa ng mika
timawang Filipinas. Sinopan at atiu keng gulut da reng aniban da reng manyawas
agad a katimawan at sinopan no retang linaban kanita. Tetag ne ing Asociacion de
los Veteranos de la Revolucion (Association of Veterans of the Revolution), nung
nu la menikuang pension at inayus na la reng pamanyali dang gabun at beyaran
dang baldugan.

Inyang deng manungkulan a Americanu mebisa lang miladlad ya bandera ning
Filipinas inyang 1919, y Aguinaldu elilan at semasnan ne ing kayang bale para
ilalad ne ing bandera, ing aklasan at ing pangatimawa ning bangsa. Ing bale na
makatikdo ya pa at kilala yang bilang Aguinaldo Shrine.

Y Aguinaldo retiru ya keng mata da reng tau king maluat a panaun. Inyang 1935
inyang mitatag ya ing Commonwealth ning Filipinas para king pamagsadia king
katimawan ning Filipinas, tinagal yang pamuntuk dapot mesambut yang dakal kang
Manuel L. Quezon a metisung Kastila a biasang magsalita at sane keng
balitaktakan.

Kaibat deng ikua pasibayu deng Ameicanu ing Filipinas, y Aguinaldu dikpan de
kambe da reng aliwa pa, uling makisabwatan la kanu ka reng Japon. Mekulung ya
king kulungan Bilibid anggang inyang mipatawaran ya keng pamuntuk. King kayang
pamag litis mebalu na agawa na ita uling mengapilitan ya mu. Pematakutan deng
paten do reng kayang buung pamilya.

Y Aguinaldo ikit na ing paninasan ng mitimawa ya ing Filipinas. Ing bangsa
menikua yang katimawan inyang July 4, 1946, inyang ing gubiernung Americanu
kilalanan ne ing lubus ng katimawan. Inyang pigmasusian de ing aldo katimawan
king Luneta, ing 77 apat a banua genral binuat ne ing bandera a itinas na king
Kawit June 12, 1898, ing aldo na paniwalan ng tutung aldo Katimawan.

Inyang 1950, para mibalik ing kayang dangal, ing Pamuntuk Elpidio Quirino
tilduan ne y Aguinaldo bilang kayanib ning Council of State, nung nu ya migsilbi
keng buung panaun. kaibat na nita migpainawa ne at bilus na ngan ing kayang oras
ka reng kapakanan da reng sundalus at king karelang kayapang kabilyan, ing
pamaglugud king bangsa at demokrasya king Filipinas, at ing pamiugne na ning
Filipinas at America.

Inyang 1962, inyang ing America ene tinggap ing anyaran ning Filipinas na
bayaran na ning America ing mengasira pauli na ning Meto-Yatung Labanan II, ing
pamuntuk Diosdado Macapagal elilan ne ing Aldo Katimawan June 12 ibat July 4.
Yapin ing pekatagumpe ng Aguinaldu ini, inya mipalundag ya king kayang pangarate
para tumagun king kapagmasusian na ning Katimawan kaibat ning 64 banua inyang
pisiag ne iti. Y Aguinaldo mete ya inyang February 6, 1964 keng coronary
thrombosis king Veterans Memorial Hospital king Quezon City. Kitkut de king
Aguinaldo Shrine king Kawit, Cavite.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diuretic

Ing diuretic metung yang panulu na tatas na ing pamaglual ning paman-i
(diuresis). Dakal a categoria keng diuretics. Deng ngan diuretics titas na ing
pamaglual ning danum keng katawan, agiang deng aliwang pinduan da reng diuretics
a gagawan na king makaaliwang paralan.

Deng matas a kisaming diuretics, diuretics la nung nu iti mamye lang dakal a
dakal a pamn-i anggang mga 20% na ning mesalak a milulan a NaCl ampong danum.
Iti maragul, compera keng pangkaraniwan a renal sodium reabsorption nung nu
maglakuan yang ~0.4% a filtered sodium keng imi.

Deng Loop diuretics atin lang kagiwan, ampong inya wawangis da la kareng matas
kisaming diuretics. Deng Loop diuretics, kalupa da reng furosemide, sasagkan na
ing kagiwan ning katawan a sipsipan nang pasibayu ing sodium at king pamaitas na
ning ascending loop keng batu nung nu tutuntun keng mitatagan ing danum keng imi
bilang danum na tutukian nang pabalik ing sodium papunta keng extracellular
fluid (ECF). Deng aliwang alimbawa a matas a kisaming loop diuretics, abe la
reng ethacrynic acid, torsemide ampong bumetanide.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deepak_Chopra

I Deepak Chopra (Hindi: दीपक चोपड़ा; mibait Octubre 22, 1946) metung yang
Americanung talapanulu ampong talasulat a mibait India. Tinuru ya i Chopra
kareng eskuelang medikal ning Tufts University, Boston University ampong Harvard
University. Megi yang Chief of Staff ning New England Memorial Hospital (NEMH)
king Massachusetts, bayu ya minta king pribadung pamanulu (private practice).
Anyang 1985, mikit ya i Chopra ampo i Maharishi Mahesh Yogi, at inagkat ne i
Choprang manigaral king Ayurveda. Likwan neng Chopra ing pusisyun na king NEMH
at megi yang a pamuntuk ning American Association of Ayurvedic Medicine, at
kaybat medical director ning Maharishi Ayurveda Health Center.

Kanitang 1996, tetag neng Chopra ampo ing neurologist a i David Simon ing Chopra
Center for Wellbeing, nung nu makayanib ing Ayurveda king kayang kaparalanan, at
atyu king La Jolla, California. Babye lang kreditu para king taglus-taglus a
pamagaral king pamanulu (continuing medical education) deng University of
California, San Diego, School of Medicine ampong American Medical Association
para kareng aliwang programang yampang da kareng talapanulu (physicians) king
Chopra Center. Anyang 2002, inalis neng Chopra ampong Simon ing the Chopra
Center king lugal ning La Costa Resort and Spa king Carlsbad, California.
Kanitang 2009, tetag neng Chopra ing Chopra Foundation ba yang isulung ing
pangimut ning pamanulung pangkaisipan ampong pangkatawan, pamagaral, ampong
pamanyalugsug to advance the cause of mind/body spiritual healing, education,
and (research) kapamilatan ning pamangalap pondu para kareng mepiling proyektu.

Mekasulat neng maygit 65 books a libru i Chopra, at 19 la reng New York Times
bestseller. Milikas no kareng 35 a amanu deng kayang libru, at maygit nong 20
milyun deng misali king mabilug a yatu. Tinanggap neng dakal a galal i Chopra,
kayabe ya ing Oceana Award (2009), ing Cinequest Life of a Maverick Award
(2010), Humanitarian Starlite Award (2010), and the GOI Peace Award (2010).
Agpang kareng aliwa, ya ing "metung ya kareng manimunang pekapun ning pangimut a
kaisipan-katawan-espiritu" ("He is thought by some to be "one of the pre-eminent
leaders of the mind-body-spirit movement").

Template:New Age Movement Template:Transcendental Meditation Template:Use
American English Template:Monthly clean up categoryTemplate:CatTrack



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dagis-dagisan

King anatomy o pamibalangkas ning tau, ing dagis-dagisan (biceps brachii king
English) metung yang laman o muscle a atyu king takde. Atin yang mapilan a gamit
ing dagis-dagisan. Ing pekamaulaga kareti, yapin ing pamibaluktut ning siku,
ampo ing pamandurut king dake ning takdeng bandang gamat (forearm).

Mapaliaring ing dagis-dagisan ing kilalang diling laman, uling gad yang
mayayakit, at malino ya angiang karetang e atleta o talapamialung. Balu reng
balu iti deng bodybuilder, at maliari yang dagal mayap king uli ning pamagsane
kareng pabayat o w:weight training.

Nung gamitan la reng laman king bandang babo ning gulut (upper back muscles)
neng babagse (rowing) ampong manigut, miyabe ya murin ing dagis-dagisan uli ning
masikan a pamangailangan king pamagbaluktut ning siku (elbow flexion). Nanupata,
ing kayagnan a pamanatiat (simultaneous flexion) ning glenohumeral joint sangkan
ne ning pangakaba ning dagis-dagisan, ania mimina ing pamaglati (contraction) na
niti, at miyayalis ing obrang pamanatiat ning siku king brachialis ampo king
brachioradialis. Ausan dang w:dynamic stabilizer ing papil ning dagis-dagisan
kareng kimut a anti kaniti.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coptic_(amanu)

Ing Coptic o Coptic Egyptian (Ⲙⲉⲧⲣⲉⲙ̀ⲛⲭⲏⲙⲓ Met.Remenkīmi) ing tauli nang dangka
o stage ning Amanu ning Ehiptu Ehiptu, metung a amanung pangulung Afro-Asiatic a
magagamit king Ehiptu angga aniang kalabimpitung dilanua o siglu. Migumpisa yang
ginamit alpabetung Griegu ing Egyptian aniang mumunang dilanua;. Ing sulat a
Coptic, metung a alpabetung ibat king Griegu at miyalilan bagia ba lang miragdag
deng letrang mangabaldugang katning ala king Griegu. Pilan la reng makikilalang
dialektung Coptic, at ing Sahidic ampong Bohairic ing pikabaluan dili.

Melabung ya ing Coptic antimong amanu ning malagung paniulat o literatura
manibat aniang kadua anggang kalabing atlung dilaua, at angga ngeni, amanu yang
magagamit king pisamban ing dialectung Bohairic king Iglesia nang Coptic ning
Alexandria. Elilan ne ning Arabu ning Ehiptu aniang umpisa ning kapanaunan a
modernu, dapot panigobran da ing pasibayung pamangambul na niti manibat aniang
kalabingsiam a dilanua. Ating sasabing e ya man mete o mewala iti.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/China

Ing Maldang Republica ning Tsina o kaya keng English, The People's Republic of
China (PRC; Template:Zh-stp listen (help·info)), kebaluan bilang Tsina, o keng
English metung yang bangsa king Aslagang Asia. Atin yang maiggit 1.31 billion a
katau, iti ing pekaramakal diling populasyun a bangsa. King maiggit a 9.5
million km² (3.7 million square miles). Ing kayang tungku iyapin ing Beijing.

Ing Maldang Republika ning Tsina tatalanan no reng maiggit aduang-pulung aduang
lalawigan at tuturing ne ing Táiwān (台湾) bilang ing kayang kaduang pulung atlung
lalawigan. Bukud kareng lalawigan, atin yang limang autonomous regions (自治区), at
balang metung atin yang katutubung minoridad; apat a balen at aduang Special
Administrative Regions a magkasuelu keng karelang autonomia. Ding aduang-pulung
lalawigan, limang autonomous regions at apat a balen malyari lang mayaus bilang
"mismung gabun nig Tsina", kayang magagamit a ela kayabe reng Hong Kong at
Macau. Deng tututki ilapin deng administraibung makadake a tatalnan ning Maldang
Republika ning Tsina.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Centro_Escolar_University

Ing Centro Escolar University (PSE: CEU) metung yang privadung universidad king
Filipinas. Deng mitatag kaniti kanitang 3 ya ing Juniu, 1907 adwa lang babai, i
Librada Avelino ampo i Carmen de Luna. Centro Escolar de Señoritas ing mumuna
nang lagyu. Ngeni, atlu ya campus ining universidad, ing Mendiola Campus king
Dalang Mendiola king Menila, ing Malolos Campus a mitatag kanitang 1978 king
dake nang pangulu ning Malolos Lakanbalen king lalawigan ning Bulacan, ampo ing
bayung dili, ing Makati Campus, a mibusni ketang 2005 king Central Business
District ning Makati Lakanbalen. Kayabe ya king suge (system o network) ning
universidad ing Parañaque anggang misara ya ini ketang decadang 1990.

Makaparikiil ya ing uiversidad king pamanuru at pamagsane da reng kayanakan a
Filipinu kareng sanga ning alit (arts), humanidades, ciencia at kayanib ning
medicina. Kilala ya murin ing CEU kareng mayayari king cursung Dentistry at
Pharmacy. Kikilalanan (accredited) no ning Federation of Accrediting Agencies of
the Philippines deng eganagana nang programa ning uiversidad king Level 2 ampong
Level 3. Ing CEU ing mumunang uiversidad ning Filipinas a mirinan pamipatune
(certification) ning ISO:9001 kareng kayang campus, metung a bageng magsilbing
magpatas king uri ning pamanyuyu o serviciu na kareng kayang magaral. Mirinan ya
muring ganap a pamagsarili (full autonomy status) ibat king Commission on Higher
Education ing universidad. Makalista ya king w:Philippine Stock Exchange ing
universidad king lalam ning sagisag a CEU. Ngening 2007 ne pagmasusyan ning
universidad ing dinalan a banwa ning kayang pangatatag.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Ruiz_Zaf%C3%B3n

I Carlos Ruiz Zafón (mibait king Barcelona, 25 Setiembre 1964) metung yang
novelistang ibat Espania a manuknangan king Los Angeles manibat aniang 1993,
nung nu ya pilan banuang susulat script kabang magsane ya king kayang carera
anting talasulat.

Ing mumuna nang novela, ing El príncipe de la niebla (Ing Principe ning ing Ulap
o The Prince of Mist, 1993), sinambut ya king galal pangkasulatan a Edebé para
kareng obrang pikudtang pangkayanakan a atiu king edad (young adult fiction).
Talasulat de murin deng atlu pang novelang pangkayanakang atiu king edad, deng
El palacio de la medianoche (1994), Las luces de septiembre (1995) ampong Marina
(1999).

Aniang 2001, bilalag ne ing novelang La sombra del viento (Ing Alino ning
Angin), ing mumuna nang novelang pang matua o atiu king edad, a miliun-miliun
nang copia ing misali king mabilug a yatu, at maigit metung miliun king Britania
mû. Manibat aniang mibulalag ya, pinuri de reng critico king mabilug a yatu ing
La sombra del viento, at dakal ya simbut a galal a internacional. Mibulalag na
la kareng 45 a bangsa deng obra nang Ruiz Zafón, at milikas na la kareng maigit
30 amanu. Agpang kareng bilang a reti, i Ruiz Zafón ing pekamatagumpeng
talasulat a talasulat ning Espania king panaun tamu, kayabe nang Javier Sierra,
a mibulalag na kareng apat a pulu't aduang bangsa, ampo i Juan Gómez-Jurado, a
mibulalag na kareng apat a pulu't metung a bangsa.

Mibulalag ya ing kadua nang novelang Ruiz Zafón, ing El juego del angel, (Ing
Pialung ning Anghel, aniang Abril 2008 Ing edicion a Ingles, ing The Angel's
Game, a linikas nang Lucia Graves, a anak ning poetang i Robert Graves. Prequel
ya king Ing Alino ning Angin, a miliari murin king Barcelona, dapot kanitang
decadang 1920 ampong 1930. Tungkul ya kang (at cucuentu neng) David Martin, a
metung a kayanakan a talasulat a lepitan ning metung a misteriosong tau bang
sumulat libru. Balak neng yabeng Ruiz Zafón king metung a serie da reng apat a
libru, kayabe ne ning Ing Alino ning Angin.

Mibulalag ya ing bersion nang Ingles ning El príncipe de la niebla (The Prince
of Mist, 1993) aniang 2010.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulkang_Canlaon

Ang Bulkang Kanlaon, o kaya Bunduk Kanlaon (neng misan miki kulitan a Canlaon),
metung yang stratovolcano king Negros pulu king Filipinas. Atiu king lalawigan
pilatan ding lalawigan ning Negros Occidental atNegros Oriental king Visayas
labuad (10°24.7'N, 123°7.9'E), mga 36 km maulingaslagan ning Bacolod Lakanbalen.

Kanlaon has an elevation of 2,435 meters and a base diameter of 30 km and is
dotted with pyroclastic cones and craters. The summit of Kanlaon contains a
broad elongated northern caldera with a crater lake. A smaller but more active
crater lies in the south.

The volcano has three hot springs on its slopes: Mambucal Hot Springs on the
northwest, Bucalan Hot Spring, Bungol Hot Spring. Its adjacent volcanic edifices
are Mt. Silay and Mt. Mandalagan, north of Kanlaon.

In ancient times, native priests (babaylan) would climb up the mountain and do
rituals every good harvest season or when there is a special ceremony. They
would also offer gifts as a sign of respect. Canlaon City now stands beside the
mountain.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Hope

I Bob Hope, KBE, KCSG, KSS, mibait a Leslie Townes Hope (Mayo 29, 1903 – Julio
27, 2003), metung yang Americanung komedyanting mibait king Inglaterra,
vaudevillian, artista, magkanta, teterak, talasulat libru ampong atletang linage
king Broadway, king vaudeville, kareng pelikula, king telebisyon, ampo king
radyu. Pikabaluan ya kareng dakal nang palageng United Service Organizations
(USO) pare kareng militar a Americanu—mikyabe ya kareng 57 a tour para king USO
pilatan ning 1941 ampong 1991. King makaba nang karera, mirinan yang dangalan
para king obrang ini. Anyang 1997, tinuring neng "mumuna ampong magdili-diling
pang-dangalan a beteranu ning ukbu ning Estados Unidos." (the "first and only
honorary veteran of the U.S. armed forces.") ning U.S. Congress."

King kayang karerang 60 banwa kakaba (1934 anggang 1994), linage ya i Hope
kareng maygit 70 pelikula ampong mangakuyad a pelikula (shorts), kayabe ya ing
serye da reng pelikulang "Road" kayabe ya i Bing Crosby ampo i Dorothy Lamour.
Bukud king pamagsilbing host ning Academy Award labing apat a ukdu o besis,
linage ya kareng dakal a produksyon king entabladu ampong papil king telebisyon,
at sinulat yang labing apat a libru. Memyalung yang pasiknangan a golf ampong
boksing, at atin yang malating dake king koponang baseball ning kayang balen,
ing Cleveland Indians. Anam a pulu't syam (69) neng banwang asawa ing kalupa
nang lalageng i Dolores Hope (mibait a DeFina).



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benigno_S._Aquino,_Jr.

Metung yang manimunang oposisyonista king Filipinas anyang panaun nang Ferdinand
Marcos i Benigno Simeon "Ninoy" Aquino Jr. (Nobiembri 27, 1932-Agostu 21, 1983).
Beril de at pete king Manila International Airport (a ngeni makalagyu na kaya)
karatang na ibat king pamanuknangan aliwang bansa. King balu nang i Corazon
Aquino misentru ing laban kang Marcos, at bandang tawli, ya ing menalili kaya
anting pamuntuk.

Mibait ya y Ninoy king Concepción, Tarlac, king metung a pamilyang hacendero.
Metung yang heneral king rebolusyun king lalam nang Emilio Aguinaldo ing kayang
ingkung, y Servillano Aquino, kabang ing tata na naman, y Benigno Aquino Sr.,
myembru ya king gabineti anyang panaun ning Commonwealth o Mancomunidad, at
matas yang opisyal ketang kapamahalan nang Jose P. Laurel kanitang gubyernung
Japon. Mete ya y tata na anyang baintau ya pamu y Ninoy. Kinangwa yang abogasya
(law) king University of the Philippines y Ninoy, nung nu ya meging kayanib ning
Upsilon Sigma Phi.Tinuknang yang magaral ba yang mag-peryodista. Anyang 1954,
pinili ne ning pamuntuk, i Ramon Magsaysay, ban magsilbing personal a
talapamilatan a makisabi kang Luis Taruc, a pekapun ning grupung HMB (Hukbong
Magpapalaya ng Bayan, “Ukbung Mitimawa king Balen”, ing sadyang Hukbalahap), a
lalaban king kapamahalan. Kaybat ning apat a bulan a misasabi la ring adwang
panig, mebisa yang sumukung alang kondisyonis y Taruc. Megi yang alkaldi ning
Concepción kanitang 1955 king idad a beinti-dos y Ninoy. Ita muring banwang ita,
mikasal lang Corazón Cojuangco..

Megi yang gobernador ning Tarlac kanitang 1961, at mepili yang secretary-general
ning Partido Liberal kanitang 1966. Ketang 1967, mibili ya king kasalesayan
anyang megi yang peka-anak a senador king amlat o kasalesayan ning Filipinas.

Anyang dineklara nang Presidenti Marcos ing martial law kanitang 1972, mekulung
ya y Aquino king sangkan a pamakamate, pamanyalikut baril a alang lisensya,
ampong subversion. Miyatulan yang migkasala at mate kanitang Noviembre ning
1977. Pepaintulutan deng munta king America bang magpaulu kanitang 1980, kayabe
ne ning kayang asawa.

Agyang kikilalanan deng manimuna kareng kalaban nang Presidenti Marcos y Senador
Aquino, tuturing de muring kayanib king sistema ning tradisyunal a pulitika
ketang bayu mag-martial law. Nanupata, mibayu yang maragul kanitang panaun ning
kayang pangasukul (nung kapilan denasan na ing “solitary confinement”), at
maragul ing pamanaliwa king kayang kaugalyan at panlalawe king bye. Kinanwa yang
sikanan kareng debosyon a Catolicu, at dininan deng diwa deng kasulatan nang
Mohandas Gandhi at Martin Luther King Jr.. Uli na niti, anti lang mika kinang a
relihyosu deng mitatagan a banwa ning kayang byeng personal at pulitikal. Megi
yang masigasig a talatuki ning e-pamangamit king kalasipan (non-violence) king
pamaglaban king rehimen nang Marcos. Lipat ning pamikakunu da ring mapilan king
bayung panga-ispirituwal ning pamalak nang Aquino, mika maragul yang epektu iti
king megi nang papil ning kayang asawa king pulitika, ampo king milyaring
pamikilala kaya anting martir ning bayung panaun.

Anyang atyu king aliwang bansa, menatili yang manimunang pekapun ning oposisyun
y Aquino. Kanitang Agosto 21, 1983, mibalik ya king Filipinas lipat ning balu
nang balu ing peligrung arapan na. Makasadya yang mibalik bang magkasákit kayabe
da reng kayang kabalen, at deretsung makisabi kang Marcos a kuldas king
katungkulan, at manyad payapang pamanalili king kapamahalan at reporma o
kapanumanan..

Lipat da ring dakal nang bante at sundalus ning kapamahalan king tarmac, mebaril
ya king buntuk at mete kabang alalayan deng kuldas king Manila International
Airport. Pamilit ning kapamahalan, dapot e re peniwalan, a beril neng Rolando
Galman, a tambing da namang beril at pete deng sundalus ning gubyernu.

Mapalyaring e na mika opisyal a yatul nung bakit gewa nang Galman ita, o agyang
mu mang nung ya pin ing tutung maki dapat, dapot dakal lang magsuspetsang
singkanan de mu y Galman at ala yang kabalwan. Lalu lang dakal deng suspetsa
nung ninung minutus. Eganana, manibat king CIA angga king Partido Komunista ning
Filipinas at ing First Lady, y Imelda Marcos, misangkanang ating balu king
pamakamate. Dapat muring linawan a mabayat ya sakit kanitang panaun a ita i
Presidenti Marcos; atyu king National Kidney and Transplant Institute a
magpasikan kaybat ning kayang kidney transplant ketang Agosto 7. Ala ya king
kabilyan a magpalakad king gubyernu anyang milyari iti. Dakal lang “conspiracy
theory” a linto nung ninu ing manibala kanita, at ninung minutus king
asasinasyun kabang magpaynawa ya’t manayang kumayap i Marcos. Inutus nang
Presidenti Marcos a mitatag independyenting lupung, itang Agrava Commission, a
magsyasat king krimen. Mituru la reng mangatas a opisyales, kayabe ne y Gen.
Fabian Ver, ing hepi ning Armed Forces, at kilala bilang talapagpatupad nang
Marcos, dapot miyatulan lang alang kasalanan. King salukuyan, makakulung lang
kabang-bye king New Bilibid Prisons deng sundalus a atyu king tarmac kanitang
panaun a ita. Kapilan pamu, mig-apela lang bawasan do reng karelang sentensya
kaybat ning adwang pulu’t adwang (22) banwa, at sasabyan dang y Eduardo
"Danding" Cojuanco, metung a crony nang Marcos at pisan nang Corazon Aquino, ing
minutus.

Miras labing adwang oras, manibat alas nuwebi ning abak anggang alas nuwebi ning
bengi, ing kayang marcha ning pamangutkut, a mig-umpisa king metung a misa king
Sto. Domingo Church nung nu ya atyu y Jaime Cardinal Sin, ing manimunang
Arzobispung Catolicu king Filipinas, at migwakas king Manila Memorial Park, ing
kayang tawling pipagpaynawan. Adwa lang milyun deng taung linwal king dalan
anyang libing, at pilan la pang milyun deng mekiramdam king Radio Veritas, ing
istasyun ning Iglesia Catolica, a ya kabud maki-sikanan lub a magbalita king
malilyari king marcha. Lipat ning megi yang pamitagun ing marcha ba rang ipalwal
ing kamwa da reng malda king gubyernu nang Marcos, keraklan taimik ne man iti,
at ating pinandit a mekabiru la pa deng tau. Alimbawa, anyang migumpisang muran
kabang lalakad la reng makipaglibing, mituknang ing pangabusni da reng payung
anyang ating kinulayit a “Y Imelda (Marcos) mu ing magpayung!” Anyá namang miras
la king Rizal Park deng makipaglibing, pinilit deng ibaba king “half mast” ing
bandera karin.

Uli ning pamakamate da kang Ninoy, bigla yang meragul ing oposisyun. Manibat
king metung a pangimut a malati at anting makakawani karing keraklan, megi yang
pangmaldang pangimut nung nu la kayanib deng tau ibat kareng eganaganang
kabilyan king sosyedad king Metro Manila. Kayanib la reng kasantingan kabilyan o
middle class, makanyan murin deng pakakalulu, at angga reng negosyanting mimwa
kang Marcos anyang martial law. Pepakit ning asasinasyun nung makananu yang
milalako na kontrol ing kapamahalan nang Marcos. Mabayat ya sakit y Marcos
anyang milyari iti, kabang pepaburen deng mipakarok deng crony ing ekonomya
anyang ala yu. Mimwa lang tutu deng talatuki nang Aquino a pepaburen nang
malyari iti king metung a manimunang oposisyunista. Uling king maleparan a
kagulwan a bunga ning asasinasyun, mibili ya ing Filipinas king pansing ning
America. Mitutuk ing paglalawe da ring tau king krisis king bansa, ing sobra
nang luhung Imelda ampo reng kayang “mining operation,” at ampon ing mipalalu
nang pangadiktador Marcos. Mitakutan ya y Ronald Reagan a malyari ing metung a
magulu, pangkabilugan at marayang rebolusyun a makásira king interes ning
America king Filipinas, at king tetagan ning rehiyun. Migsalita ya y Reagan
laban king asasinasyun, oneng ala yang sinabi kontra king kaluguran (friend)
nang y Marcos.

Uli na ning pamakamate, mibili ya king pansing ning malda y Cory, a balu nang
Ninoy. Karas ning 1986, mengampanya ya y Cory Aquno ketang snap election a
inutus nang Marcos bang mayampat ing milalako nang tiwala ning malda king kayang
rehimen. Ketang limampulu’t pitung (57) aldo ning pamangampanya bayu ing alalan
anyang Febrero 7, 1986, linibut ya king bansa ing partidung UNIDO nang Aquino,
at alus eganaganang lalawigan apuntalan da. Kabang mangampanya, atwan de y
Aquino deng pakalupung a taung gugulisak a "Cory! Cory! Cory!". Lipat ning
pamagdeklara ning Commission on Elections (COMELEC) a y Marcos ing sinambut king
alalan, e ra tinggap di Cory ampon reng keyang talasuporta ing dekalarsyun ampon
sinabi rang dang mepirait ing resulta. Ini ing penibatan ning People Power
revolucion a mitabi kang Marcos at miglukluk kang Cory anting Pamuntuk.

Mipalagyu ya ing Manila International Airport a Ninoy Aquino International
Airport (NAIA) anting panalala kaya, at makabili ya letratu king perang papil a
limang dalan a pesus.

Metung yang kongresistang pekakatawan ning mumunang distritu ning Tarlac ing
kayang anak a lalaki, i Benigno Aquino III, kabang lalage ne man king telebisyun
at pelikula ing anak nang babai, y Kris Aquino.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viswanathan_Anand

I V. Anand or Anand Viswanathan, a keraklang ausan dang Viswanathan Anand
(Tamil: விசுவநாதன் ஆனந்த், IPA: [ʋiʃʋəˈn̪aːt̪ən ˈaːnən̪d̪]; mibait 11 Dicembre
1969) metung yang Grandmaster a Indian king chess ampong kasalukuyang Kampeon
ning Yatu king Chess. Mekatalima neng sinambut i Anand king World Chess
Championship (2000, 2007, 2008, 2010, 2012), at ya ing alang salungat a Kampeon
ning Yatu manibat kanitang 2007.

Ya ing tinalan king FIDE World Chess Championship manibat 2000 anggang 2002,
anyang panaun e mepitna la king titulung pangyatu. Ya ing meging alang
sasalungat a Kampeon ning Yatu anyang 2007 at pemingwa ne ing kayang titulu
laban kang Vladimir Kramnik anyang 2008. Kaybat, matagumpe neng pemingwa ing
kayang titulu king World Chess Championship 2010 laban kang Veselin Topalov ampo
king World Chess Championship 2012 laban kang Boris Gelfand. Antimong makalukluk
a kampeon, arapan ne ing sumambut king datang a Candidates Tournament king World
Chess Championship 2013.

Metung ya kareng anam a talapamyalung king kasalesayan a mekabalbal king markang
2800 i Anand king listaan a FIDE rating, at anyang Abril 2007 king edad a 37, ya
ing meging manimuna king yatu king mumunang pamikatagun. Mekatalima ya kareng
anam a pamikatagun king babo ning pamagranggung pangyatu, manibat Abril 2007
anggang Julio 2008, at telan ne ing mumunang ranggu king kabilugan kareng labing
limang (15). Anyang Octubre 2008, milwal ya king ranggung mumunang atlu king
mumunang pamikatagun manibat anyang Julio 1996. Ikwa neng pasibayung Anand ing
mumunang ranggu king yatu anyang 1 Noviembre 2010, anyang simbut ne ing
kasalukuyan a mumuna king yatung i Magnus Carlsen king Bilbao Masters, oneng
sibli ne kang Carlsen ing posisyon a iti anyang Julio 2011.

I Anand ing meging mumunang grandmaster ning India anyang 1988. Ya murin ing
mumunang tinanggap king Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award anyang 1991–92, ing
pekamatas a dangalan ning India king pasiknangan. Anyang 2007, tinggap ne ing
kadwang pekamatas a galal ning India para kareng sibilan,ing Padma Vibhushan, at
uli na nita, ya ing mumunang tau king pasiknangan ing tinanggap king dangalan a
ita king amlat ning India.

Linarawan neng Lubomir Kavalek i Anand a pekamaleparan belwan a kampeon ning
yatu king kabilugan ning panaun ("the most versatile world champion ever"),
uling bukud mung i Anand kareng sablang talapamyalung ing sinambut king
kampeonatong pangyatu kareng dakal a format, kayabe ya ing Tournament, Match,
Rapid, ampong Knockout chess.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uttar_Pradesh

Coordinates: 26°51′N 80°55′E﻿ / ﻿26.85, 80.91 Ing Uttar Pradesh (Hindi: उत्तर
प्रदेश, Urdu: اتر پردیش, pronounced [ʊt̪ːər prəd̪eːʃ] (help·info), líkas:
Pangulung Lalawigan), [maralas deng ausang U.P.], metung yang estadu king
pangulu nang dake ning India. Maki populasiun yang 190 miliun, at uli na niti,
yang estadung maki maragul dili populasiun, ampo ing dake ning yatung mas mababa
lebel king timawang bangsang (sub-national entity) maki pekamaragul a
populasiun. Lima la mu deng bangsa (kayabe ya ing India mismu) a mas dakal tau
kesa king U.P.

Maki lapad yang 93,933 sq mi (243,286 km²) ing Uttar Pradesh, a bibilug king
maragul nang dake ning makababong kapatagan a Gangetic (upper Gangetic plain), a
mataba gabun ampong maki dakal a tau. Atin yang angganan king aliwang bangsa,
king Nepal, at padurutan de reng estadu ning Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh,
Haryana, Delhi, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand ampong Bihar.
Ing kayang tungku o capitoliung pangkapanibalan (administrative) ampong
pang-leyi yapin ing Lucknow, kabang ing sentru nang pang-pisalapian ampong
pang-industria ya pin ing Kanpur. Atiu ne man king Allahabad ing matas nang
ukuman ning estadu. Mayayakit la keti deng dakal a lakanbalen o ciudad a
makasalesayan, antimo ing Agra ampo ing Varanasi.

King keraklan king kayang amlat o kasalesayan, mapipitna ya kareng mangalating
kaarian ing Uttar Pradesh, at neng kai, kayabe ya kareng mas maragul a imperiung
linto king kayang aslagan o albugan, kayabe la reng imperiung Magadha, Nanda,
Mauryan, Kushan, Gupta, Sunga, Pala ampong Mughal. Maulaga ing papil ning Uttar
Pradesh king cultura ning India. Tuturing deng duyan ning Hinduismu, at keti la
mayayakit deng mangaulagang lugal ning peregrinasiun o pamaglakbe kareng banal a
lugal (pilgrimage) da reng Hindu. Maragul murin king dake ning pamana ning
Imperiung Mughal ing atiu keti, kayabe ne ing pikabaluan a Taj Mahal ampo ing
libingan ning Emperador Akbar king Agra, ampo ing tungku nang Akbar king
Fatehpur Sikri.

Ing kapatagan a Indo-Gangetic, a bibilug king keraklan ning estadu, ing luklukan
na kanitang minuna ning relihiun, beluan ampong culturang Hindu, ing lugal a
beitan ning pibuklud a culturang Indo-Islamic kanitang Edad Media, a meging
sentru ning nasionalismu aniang panaun ning pamaniakup, at angga ngeni, maulaga
kareng pangimut a pang-pulitica ampong pang-cultura. Maki mabandi yang pamana da
reng tradisiunal a pang-kalalangan ampong industriang mangalati ing estadu nung
nu la magobra deng tala-lalang a matenakan at mabeluan.

Ing Uttar Pradesh ing maragul dili populasiun kareng estadu ampong teritoriu
ning India, at yang maki pekamaragul populasiun kareng pamirakeng administratibu
o pangkapanibalan a mumunang balitang o lebel king yatu. Ing kanpur ing
pekamaragul a lakanbalen king estadu. Deng aliwang mangaragul a lakanbalen ila
reng Lucknow - ing tungku nang pampulitica ning estadu, ing Meerut, Agra,
Varanasi, Bareilly, Allahabad, Ghaziabad ampong Noida. Deng Brahmin, Kshatriya
ampong Vaishya, deng atlung pekamatas a caste o uri da reng tau king estadu, a
manimuna kareng bageng pang-pulitica ampong pang-kabiayan kareng mengalabasan a
siglu o dilanua, ila reng bibilug king keraklan king populasiun ning estadu.
Metung lang maragul a dake deng mababang uri o caste, deng scheduled a caste,
ampo reng tribu. Deng populasiun da reng tribu keraklan atiu kareng labuad o
rehion a hill, terai-bhabhar ampong Vindhya. Lima la reng kikilalanan ning
kapamahalang sentral: deng Tharus, Bhoksas, Bhotias, Jaunswaris ampong Raji ila
pin deng tribung scheduled. Bukud kareng mangatas a uri, atin pang aliwang
comunidad o pamalenan a Hindu ampong Muslim. Deng scheduled a caste o tribu
mabibie la kareng marangle o rural area, at keraklan kareti, magdependi la king
agrikultura o pamanasik, at ilang bibilug king uring talapagobrang alang gabun.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_the_Assumption

Ing University of the Assumption (U.A.) metung yang privadu ampong Catolicung
universidad ning Arquidiocesis a atiu king Lakanbalen ning San Fernando,
Pampanga, Filipinas. Mitátag ya kanitang Enero 12, 1963. Ya kabud a universidad
a Catolicu ning metung a arquidiocesis king Filipinas ampo king Asia.

Aniang minuna, Assumption Junior College ing lagiu ning universidad, at atiu
king katlung pisu (third floor) ning Gusaling Assumpta king kabalenan ning San
Fernando. Panibalan neng Sr. Gunfrida Schneyer, O.S.B. ing eskuela, a yang
Superior ning Community of Missionary Benedictine Sisters of Tutzing (Alemania).
Maki 275 (aduang dalan pitumpulu't lima) yang magaral ing colegiu aniang
magumpisa ya. Deng mumunang kursu yampang na ila pin deti: Bachelor of Arts,
Bachelor of Science in Commerce, Bachelor of Science in Education, ampong
Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education.

Aniang 1965, minalis ya king kasalungsungan nang lugal king Unisite Subdivision
king Barangay Del Pilar ing colegiu. Aniang panaun a ita, bukud mung ing Puno
Hall ing gusaling makatikdo king campus. Kanita yang banuang 1965 oficial a
mekilala antimong Assumption College of Pampanga iting institusion.

Pari ya ing tinalan king eskuela kaibat ning pamagbayu ning kapanibalan kanitang
1966. Ikit ning administasiun nang Rev. Fr. Aniceto M. Franco, a decanu ampong
rector ketang panaun a ita, ing pamangailangan a mitátag escuelang secundaria
ampong elementaria king campus. Sinaup la king pamanibala kareng aduang
departamentu di Sr. Mary Philip Ryan, O.P. ampo reng Madreng Dominican ning Our
Lady of Remedies. I Sr. Mary Philip Ryan ing superiora ning comunidad a
Dominicanu, at maragul ing karelang papil da reng kayanib na niting comunidad
king pamanibala ampong pamanuru king institusion. Miragdag ya kareng sadiang
cursung yampang ning escuela ing Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
kantiang 1969. Mitikdo la murin deng Gusaling Ryan ampong Benedictine ampo ing
gymnasium aniang panaun a manibala ya i Fr. Franco.

I Rev. Fr. Octavio M. Ramos ing meging mumunang pamuntuk ning colegiu kanitang
1974. Aniang terminu na, penigobran na ing pamangilala da reng karagdagan a
cursu, alimbawa deng Bachelor of Science in Nursing, Bachelor of Science in
Nutrition and Dietetics, Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering, ampong
Bachelor of Science in Architecture. Mitátag ya ing Escuelang Pang-graduadu
(Graduate School), a maki cursung Master of Arts in Education ampong Master in
Business Administration. Ba yang pakibatan ing pamangailangan kareng mangakuyad
a cursu, miragdag la reng Government Accounting ampong Junior Secretarial.
Pigkalubanan neng estadu antimong universidad ing institusion kanitang 1980:
opisial yang meging University of the Assumption aniang Marzu 19, 1980.

Aniang 1986, i Rev. Fr. Cenovio M. Lumanog, Ph.D.ing tildu nang pamuntuk ning
kanita Arzobispo Oscar V. Cruz, J.C.D., D.D. Kanitang kapanaunan na, pigkalub
ning Department of Education, Culture and Sports ing kapaintulutan a miyampang
Doctoradu king Pamanuru (Doctorate Degree in Education), aniang Junio 13, 1988.

Tildu neng pamuntuk Arzobispo Paciano B. Aniceto D.D. i Most Rev. Jesus C.
Galang, D.D., a kanita Auxiliary Bishop ning San Fernando, kanitang 1990. Aniang
panaun a makalukluk ya, mitikdo ya ing gusaling Archbishop V. Cruz ampo ing
Aklatan. Kanita ya murin miragdag kareng cursung yampang ning universidad ing
Bachelor of Science in Accountancy.

I Rev. Fr. Msgr. Ricardo Jesus T. Serrano ing linukluk a pamuntuk aniang 1992.
Aniang umpisa ning kayang terminu, mitikdo yang paniabat king lahar ampo king
albug. Miragdag la reng makatuking cursu kareng kareng yampang ning univesidad:
Masters degree in Public Administration; Bachelor of Science in Hotel and
Restaurant Management; Bachelor of Arts in Interior Design; Bachelor of Science
in Commerce a maki major king computer science; ampong Master of Education a
maki majors king Early Childhood, Mathematics, ampong English.

King lalam ning pamang-giya nang Fr. Serrano, melarin ya't mibayu ing gusaling
Grade School, at megi yang gusaling atlung pisu. Peparagul de ba yang mika
atlung ambi (three wings), ing Msgr. Lumanog Building, ing Msgr. Ramos Building,
ampo ing Franco Building. Bang pakibatan ing pamangailangan ning daragul a
bilang da reng magaral, megamit la reng kuartu king Archdiocese of San Fernando
building (ASF) and the Diocese of San Fernando building (DSF) para kareng
computer laboratory, modern typing, ampong lecture room. Mika maragul muring
pamagbayu king Archbishop Cinense Gymnasium. Kayabe la king pamagbayu ning
campus deng aduang karagdagang audio-visual room, metung a Internet Center, deng
computer room ampong mapilan a multimedia classroom. Miragdag ya ing metung a
tennis court ampong mini clubhouse ba lang miragdagan deng pasilidad para king
pasiknangan (sports) king escuela.

Miyabe ya kareng matas dili ranggung pipagaralan king labuad (region) ing
Escuelang Gradua ning universidad agpang kareng resulta ning Evaluation of
Graduate Education in the Philippines (EGEP) a penibalan dang miyantabe ning
Commission on Higher Education (CHED) ampo ning Fund for Assistance to Private
Education (FAPE) manibat kanitang Julio 2003 anggang Setiembre 2004.

As of May 30, 2007 Rev. Fr. Msgr. Ricardo Jesus T. Serrano, was removed as
president of the university. Miyalilan ya i Rev. Fr. Msgr. Ricardo Jesus T.
Serrano aniang Mayo 30, 2007 antimong pamuntuk ning universidad.

Kayanib ya ing University of the Assumption kareng makatuking kikilalanan a
aguman a propesional a pambangsa:



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutung_Pisamban_nang_Jesus

Ing Tutung Pisamban nang Jesus (English Wikipedia Article: True Jesus Church)
metung yang timawang pisamban Isik a metatag king Beijing, China inyang 1917.
Keng yang Pentecostal branch ning Christianity a mibua inyang 1900s. Ngeni atin
neng mga 1.5 million a kayanib kareng apat a pulu't limang bangsa. Ing pisamban
mitatag ya Filipinas inyang 1983.

Ing "pamagbinyag keng danum" metung yang sacramentung para linisan la reng
kasalanan para ela kumabyeng pasibayu. Ing "pamagbinyag" kailangan malyari keng
natural a mabieng danum, antimong ilug, dayat malat o sibul.

Ing Magbinyag, a nung nu ya tinanggap pangabinyag danum a Espitu Santu, gawan na
kapamilatan ning lagiu nang Jesu Kristu. At ing mabibinyag buu yang ipalbug keng
danum nung nu ing buntuk makaduku ya at maka-arap palalam.

Hesu Kristo, ing Salitang meging Laman/Tao, mete ya keng krus para tubusan la
reng makasalanan, Kinabye ya keng ikatlung aldo at minukyat keng banwa. Iya mu
ing tune tagapagligtas da reng tau, Ing meglalang keng Banwa at yatu, at iya ing
tune a Diyos.

Ing Banal a Bibliya, Maglaman yang Lumang tipan at Bayung Tipan, na
inispirasyunan ning Ginu, Ing Kasulatan a tutu, at ing pamantayan da reng
Kristiyano keng karelang biye.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swami_Vivekananda

I Swami Vivekananda' (Pangayagkas a Bengali: Shāmi Bibekānando (help·info)):
Pangayagkas a Bengali: [ʃami bibekanɒnɖo]) (12 Enero 1863–4 Julio 1902), mibait
'a Narendra Nath Datta (Pangayagkas a Bengali: [nɔrend̪ro nat̪ʰ d̪ɔt̪t̪o]),
metung yang Indian a Hindu monk. Manimuna yang tauan king pamipakilala da reng
pilosopiyang Indian ning Vedanta ampong Yoga king albugan ning yatu (western
world) at ya ing sasabyan dang pepalaganap king belwan tungkul kareng
miayaliwang relihun, at tinas ne ing kabilyan ning Hinduismu antimong manimunang
relihyun ning yatu anyang tawli nang dake ning ka-19 a dilanwa o siglu. Maragul
yang pwersa king pangimut para king pasibayung pasibayung pamibangun ning
Hinduismu king India ampo ing ampo ing pamangilala king nasyonalismu king
mesakup a India. Ya ing manimuna nang disipulus ning ka-19 a dilanwang santung i
Ramakrishna ampo ing talatátag ning Ramakrishna Math ampo ing Ramakrishna
Mission. Mapalyaring kilala yang dili king kayang makabye diwang pamagsalitang
magumpisa king makabye nang diwang pamagsalitang magumpisa king "Kapatad ku king
America," ("Sisters and Brothers of America,") ing pamipakilala na king
Hinduismu king Parliament of the World's Religions king Chicago anyang 1893.

Mibait ya king aristokratikung pamilyang Bengali ning Calcutta i Vivekananda, a
migpakit hilig king ispiritwal. Meimpluwensya ya king kayang guru, i Ramakrishna
nung kenu na abalung deng anggang mabye pamikatawan na la ning banal a sarili,
at uli na niti, ing pamagsilbi king Dios malyaring daptan kapamilatan ning
pamagsilbi king meto ketawan (mankind). Kaybat nang mete ning kayang guru,
maleparan yang miglakbe i Vivekananda king Indian subcontinent at mika diretsu
yang belwan tungkul king kabilyan ning British India. Kaybat, miglakbe ya king
Estados Unidos bang maging pekakatawan ning India antimong delegadu ning 1893
Parliament of World Religions. Pilang dalan ing gewa nang pamagsalita, publiku
man o pribadu, at bilalag no reng prinsipyu ning pilosopiyang Hindu king Estados
Unidos, Inglaterra ampong Europa. King India, tuturing deng santung makabalen
(patriotic saint) i Vivekananda, at pagmasusyan de ing kayang aldo kebaytan
antimong Pambangsang Aldo ring Kayanakan (National Youth Day).



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surigao_del_Norte

Ing Surigao del Norte metung yang lalawigan ning Filipinas atiu king labuad
Caraga king Mindanao. Ing kayang balen tungku ya pin ing Surigao Lakanbalen. Ing
lalawigan atin yang atlung pulung mangaragul—Pulung Dinagat, Pulung Siargao, at
Pulung Bucas Grande—king Dayat Malat ning Filipinas, at itang malating labuad
king pekapangulung pulu ning Mindanao. Ining pekagabun a dake ing sepu na ilapin
deng Agusan del Norte, at Surigao del Sur king mauli.

Ing Surigao del Norte ya ing pekapangulung lalawigan ning Mindanao, metung yang
maulaganggagamitan dang pamagluslus manibat at papuntang Visayas at Mindanao.
Dakal lang lantsang lilipat king Surigao Strait pilatan ning Surigao at ing pulu
ning Leyte a magdalang saken at tau keng Liloan king Southern Leyte at ing
Surigao Lakanbalen.

Ing Surigao iya ing karinan da reng katutubung Mamanwa. Ing karelang terak a
ausan dang "Bonok-Bonok", pagmasusian da balang fiesta na ning San Nicolas de
Tolentino a magaganap banua-banua balang Septiembri 10. Ing The Bonok-Bonok
papakit da ing pamagsaya da ring katutubu a papasalaamat la kerang karelang
guinu para keng dakal a pupul at masaleseng kabulasan.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_Invaders

Ing Space Invaders​ (スペースインベーダー, Supēsu Inbēdā?) metung yang arcade video game a
diniseniu nang Tomohiro Nishikado, at pepalual da aniang 1978. Minuna neng gewa
at pisali ning Taito king Japan, at kaibat milisensia bang magawa king Estados
Unidos lalam ning Midway division ning Bally. Ing Space Invaders metung ya
kareng mumunang pialung a videong barilan at atin yang two-dimensional graphics.
Ing sangkan king pialung yapin ing pamaniambut kareng dakal a pakalupung a alien
kapamilatan ning ion cannon, at sumambut dakal a puntus. Diniseniu neng
Nishikado ing pialung king lalam ning inspirasiun ding sikat a media: ing
Breakout, The War of the Worlds, ampong Star Wars. Ba neng arian, migdiseniu
yang pasadiang gamit a pamialung ampong kasangkapan a pagdiseniu.

Lipat ning simpli ya cumpara kareng pialung ngeni, iti ing metung kareng
penibatan ning modernung pialung a video, at sinaup ya ba yang paragulan ing
industria da reng pialung a video manibat king bayung usu paras king pangyatung
industria. Aniang minuna yang linual, ing pialung ing meging sangkan ning
pamagkulang kareng perang tia-100-yen. Aniang 2007, miras nang US$500 miliun ing
penakitan ning Taito kaya. Agpang king Guinness World Records, ini ing
manimunang pialung a pang-arcade.

Ing pialung ing meging inspirasiun para kareng aliwang pialung a video,
mekatapilan de pepalual kareng dakal a plataporma, at dakal ya meging katuki
(sequel). Peparakal nong mekatapat (quadruple) ning 1980 Atari 2600 deng
pamaniali king pialung, at megi yang mumunang "killer app" para kareng video
game console (pipamialungan video game). Binggit de ampong gewang biru ing Space
Invaders kareng dakal a game show king telebision, at megi ya muring dake da
reng exhibition da reng video game ampong pangcultura. Ing maka-pixel a kalaban
na megi yang media icon a mangabaldugan kareng video game.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Africa

Ing Mauling Aprika, a maki opisyal a titulung Republika ning Maling Aprika,
metung yang bangsang atyu king mauli nang sepu ning Africa. Mapipitna ya kareng
siyam a lalawigan, at maki 2,798 kilometres () yang bebe dayatmalat. Atyu la
king pangulu deng bangsang kasiping na, ing Namibia, Botswana ampong Zimbabwe;
atilu king aslagan deng Mozambique ampong Swaziland; kabang ing Lesotho metung
yang enclave a padurutan ning teritoryu ning Mauling Aprika. Ing Mauling Aprika
ing kadwang pulu't lima (25th) kareng bangsa king yatu king lapad, ampo ing
kadwang pulu't apat (24th) king populasyun.

Metung yang multietnikung (myayaliwa lahing) ketawan o sosyedad ing Mauling
Aprika, a myayaliwa kultura ampong amanu. Labi lang metung deng amanung
kikilalanan ning Punbatas o Konstitusyon. Adwa kareti ing ibat king Europa: ing
Ingles ampo ing Afrikaans, a menibatan king Holandes at gagamitan da reng
keraklan kareng maputi ampong colored a Mauling Aprikanu. Lipat ning ing Ingles
ing pekamarlas magagamit king byeng pangmalda o pangpubliku ampong pangnegosyu,
kalima ya mu king bilang antimong amanu king bale. Maki pekakatawan la o
represantasyun deng anggang lahi ampong grupung lingwistiku king demokrasya nang
konstitusyonal ning bangsa; e anti kareng keraklan kareng republikang
parlamentaryu, miyayanib ya ing pekapun ning estadu (head of state) ampo ing
pekapun ning kapamahalan (head of government) king ampo ing Pamuntuk a
magdependi king Parlamentu.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siquijor

Ing Siquijor metung yang pulung lalawigan ning Filipinas a atiu king labuad
Kalibudtang Visayas. Ing kayang balen tungku yapin ing balen a mayayaus mu rin
Siquijor. King bandang pangulungalbugan ning Siquijor ya pin ing Cebu at Negros,
king pangulung aslagan ya pin ing Bohol at king mauli yapin ing, sumangid, Dayat
Malat ning Bohol ing Mindanao.

Ing Siquijor iya ing pangatlung peka malating lalawigan ning bangsa king gabun
at papulasyun kaibat ning Camiguin at Batanes. Inyang mumuna metung yang
tela-lalawigan ning Negros Oriental. Mayayaus yang Isla del Fuego o kaya Pulung
Api bayu la dintang ding Kastila, Ing Siquijor tuturing deng kababalaghan deng
Filipinu uling deng sapak yang mangkukulam, mangkukutud at aliwa pang lagpas
sikan tau.

Populasyun. Agpang keng 2000 census, atin 81,598 Siquijodnons, ing aus da ka
reng mauknagnan karin. Iti maging yang pang-3ng pekamalating lalawigan ing
Siquijor karas keng paulasyun. Ini mu rin sensus a ini sasabian na na ing
Siquijor 17,351 a pamimalemale at ing average a pamimalemale atin 4.70 a katau.

Salita. Cebuanu ing Salita king Siquijor. English ampong Tagalog mayayagkas la
naman kareng pakatuknang.

Ing Siquijor atin yang 6 balen. Ing Siquijor iya ing balen tungku pekamaulagang
daungan.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shimla

Ing Shimla pronunciation (help·info) [ʃɪmla] (Hindi: शिमला), a sadiang mayayaus
Simla, metung yang lakanbalen king estadu ning Himachal Pradesh. Tungku
(capitoliu o cabecera) ne mu naman ning estadu, at metung yang municipal
corporation kilub ning Shimla (distritu).

Mibulalag yang tungkung pangkaleldo (summer capital) ning kapamahalan ning
Britania king India ing Shimla kanitang 1864. Metung yang taniag a pupuntalan da
reng turista, at ausan deng "Queen of Hills" (Reina da reng Talimunduk, bansag a
ibat kareng Ingles). Maki kakeuan ya o pulu ning pinu, rhododendron, ampong
robles o oak ing Shimla, a presku neng kaleldo at marimlang maki yelu neng
karimlan. Atiu king dakeng pangulu-albugan (north-west) da reng kabundukan a
Himalayas, at maki tas yang 2,130 metres (). Pikabaluan ya ing lakanbalen kareng
kayang gusali king istilung tudorbethan ampong neo-gothic. Makatuglung ya ing
Shimla king lakanbalen ning Kalka kapamilatan ning metung karing makabang dili
kareng mitatágan a rutang narrow gauge railway king India.. Maki dayu yang 115
km (71.4 miles) ibat king Chandigarh, ing pekamalapit a manimunang lakanbalen,
ampong 365 km (226.8 miles) ibat king New Delhi, ing tungku ning bangsa, ing
Shimla.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serzh_Sargsyan

I Serzh Azati Sargsyan (Armenian: Սերժ Ազատի Սարգսյան, mibait June 30, 1954) ing
katlu ampong kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk ning Armenia. Sinambut ya king Alalang
pang-pamuntuk ning Febrero 2008 a maki suporta ning konserbatibung Republican
Party of Armenia, metung a partidu nung nu ya talapamuntuk (chairman), and took
office in April 2008. Anyang Febrero 18, 2013, miyalal yang pasibayung Pamuntuk.

center;" rowspan="1"|Prime Minister of Armenia 2007–2008 |width="30%"
