https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samir_Geagea

I Samir Farid Geagea (Arabu: سمير فريد جعجع, a misusulat muring Samir Ja`ja`),
mibait Octubre 25 1952, ing salukuyan a pekapun ning partido political a
Lebanese Forces (LF). Metung ya muring manimunang kayanib king March 14
Alliance, kayabe ya i Saad Hariri ampo i Amine Gemayel.

Megi yang pekapun ning Lebanese Forces aniang 1986. Kaibat ning guerrang civil,
meragul ing pamamilit ibang king Syriang tanggapan neng Gegea ing presencia ning
Syria, o marap kareng casu.[mangailangangan yang sitas/suporta] Bayu ya merakap,
lepitan de reng politicung maki simpatia kaya, at inaluk deng ligtas a pamaglual
king Lebanon.[mangailangangan yang sitas/suporta] Aniang 1994, apat a banua
kaibat ning pangayari ning Guerrang Civil king Lebanon, linitis de para kareng
apat a pamakamateng political,kayabe ne ing pamakamate kang Pun Mininstru Rashid
Karami aniang 1987, ampo ing e melaus a pamakamate kang Ministru nign
Defensa/Pamaglualu Michel Murr aniang 1991. Tinanggi ya kareng eganaganang
sasangkan da, dapot miyatulan yang migkasala, at mirinan yang apat a sentencia
nign kamatayan, at balang metung kareti, mebawas la at miyalis king kabang bie
king sukulan. Geagea was imprisoned in solitary confinement below the Lebanese
Ministry of Defense building in Beirut for the next 11 years. Mekulung ya king
solitary confinement i Geagea king lalam ning Ministerio ning Pamaglualu king
Beirut aniang tutuking 11 a banua. Ya kabud pekapun ning militiang mekulung para
kareng crimen a merapat aniang Guerrang Civil king Lebanon.

Kaibat ning Cedar Revolution, ampo ing katuki na niting pamaglako da reng fuerza
ning Syria king Lebanon, migbotu ya ing bayung alal a Parlamento ning Lebanon a
pagkalubanan yang amnestia aniang Julio 18, 2005.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salman_Rushdie

I Sir Ahmed Salman Rushdie (Kashmiri: अहमद सलमान रुशदी (Devanagari), احمد سلمان
رشدی (Nastaʿlīq);  /sælˈmɑːn ˈrʊʃdi/; mibait 19 Junio 1947) metung yang British
Indian a nobelista ampong talasulat salese o sanese (essayist). Sinambut yang
Booker Prize anyang 1981 ing kadwa nang nobela, ing Midnight's Children (1981).
Tungkul king Indian subcontinent ing keraklan king sinulat nang piksyon.
Sasabyan dang piyayabe na ing magical realism ampo ing pangkasalesayan a
piksyon; makapatungkul ing kayang obra kareng dakal a pamituglung-tuglung,
kaguluan, ampong pamanalis o pamaglipat pilatan ning Aslagan ampo ning Albugan.

Megi yang sentru ning kontrobersya ing kapat nang nobela, ing The Satanic Verses
(1988), a memupul protesta ibat kareng Muslim kareng mapilang bangsa, kayabe no
deng bayolenting reaksyon. Mika bala o kapiadyan laban king kayang bye, kayabe
ya ing fatwāng pepalwal nang Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini, ing Kakataskatasan a
Pekapun ning Iran (Supreme Leader of Iran), anyang 14 Febrero 1989.

Mituldu yang Commandeur de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres king Pransiya i
Rushdie anyang Enero 1999. Kanitang Junio 2007, gewa neng kabalyerung (knighted)
Reina Elizabeth II i Rushdie uling king kayang kasuyuan o serbisyu king malagung
panyulat o literatura. Anyang 2008, binili ne ning The Times king kalabing atlu
(13th) king kayang listaan da reng limampulung mapyang diling Briton manibat
anyang 1945.

Manibat kanitang 2000, king Estados Unidos ne makatuknang i Rushdie, at magobra
ya king Emory University; miyalal yang miabe king American Academy of Arts and
Letters. Ing pekabayu nang libru ya pin ing Joseph Anton: A Memoir, a tungkul
king kayang bye manibat anyang kontrobersya tungkul king The Satanic Verses.

Template:Rushdie Template:Man Booker Prize Winners Template:Austrian State Prize
for European Literature



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rafael_Nadal

I Rafael "Rafa" Nadal Parera (Catalan: [rəˈfɛɫ nəˈðaɫ pəˈɾeɾə]; Pangayagkas a
Castila: [rafaˈel naˈðal paˈɾeɾa]) (mibait 3 Junio 1986) metung yang Espanyol a
mamyalung tenis a propesyonal ampong sadyang mumuna king yatu. As of 11
2012 (2012 -Expression error: Unrecognized word "anyang".-11)[update], ya kadwa
agpang king Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP). Tuturing deng metung
kareng mapyang diling talapamyalung king mabilug a panaun; ing kayang tagumpe
king clay dela na kaya ing palayong "The King of Clay", at meging sangkan kareng
dakal a expertung ituring yang mapyang diling talapamyalung king clay court king
kasalesayan.

Sinambut yang labing metung a titulung Grand Slam singles, i Nadal, kayabe la
reng pitung titulung French Open, ing 2008 Olympic gold medal king singles,
metung a record a 21 ATP World Tour Masters 1000 tournament, at kayabe ya king
Spain Davis Cup team a sinambut king 2004, 2008, 2009 ampong 2011. Akumpletu ne
ing Career Grand Slam kapamilatan ning pamanyambut king 2010 US Open, ing kapitu
king kasalesayan, ampo ing pekayanak king Open Era, a manikwa kaniti. Ya ing
kadwang talapamyalung a lalaking makakumpletu king Career Golden Slam (sinambut
apat a Grand Slam ampong Olympic gold medal) kaybat nang Andre Agassi. Atin yang
e kumulang king adwang Grand Slam king balang surface i Rafael Nadal, a yang
kadwa mung talapamyalung kaybat nang Mats Wilander a manikwa king tagumpeng iti.
Ya murin ing kadwang talapamyalung a lalaking sumambut king sanumang Grand Slam
makatapitung besis o ukdu, at mekapante kareng pitu nang titulung Pete Sampras
king Wimbledon.

Mekata-32 ya sinambut i Nadal anyang 2008, manibat king 2008 Masters Series
Hamburg paras king 2008 Western & Southern Financial Group Masters and Women's
Open, kayabe ing Hamburg, ing French Open (nung nu ala yang tebiling set), ing
Queen's Club, ing mumuna nang titulu king Wimbledon, ampo ing Rogers Cup. Anyang
2012, king pamanyambut na king Monte-Carlo Masters, megi yang magdili-diling
talapamyalung a sinambut makatawalung tukituking ukdu o besis edisyon king
sanumang tournament king kasalesayan ning tennis, at ing kadwang talapamyalung a
sinambut metung a tournament makatawalung ukdu king Open Era. I Nadal ing
mumunang talapamyalung king kasalesayan ning tennis a agnan-agnan a tinalan
Grand Slams king clay, dikut ampong hardcourt. Ya murin ing mumunang (ampong
magdilidiling talapamyalung angga king salukuyan) a sinambut atlung tuki-tuking
titulung Grand Slam kareng atlung miyayaliwang surface. I Nadal ing kadwa king
ranggu king yatu, kaybat nang Roger Federer, kareng record a 160ng tuki-tuking
duminggu, bayu ne ikwa ing manimunang ranggu, a telan na manibat 18 Agosto 2008
anggang 5 Julio 2009. He regained the world No.1 ranking on 7 June 2010, after
winning his fifth French Open title. Telan ne anggang 3 Julio 2011, anyang
elilan neng Novak Djokovic antimong manimuna king yatu. I Nadal ing atyu king
kadwang ranggu king yatu para king ATP record a 238 a duminggu (anyang 11 Junio
2012).

tournament doubles winners



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer

I Pramoedya Ananta Toer (6 Febrero 1925 – 30 Abril 2006) metung yang Indonesian
a talasulat da reng novela, makuyad a salita, salese (essay), polemic ampong
amlat ning kayang bangsa ampo ning kayang lahi. Masasaklo kareng kayang obra ing
panaun ning pamaniakup, ing pamagalsa ning Indonesia para king katimawan, ing
pamaglub da reng Hapones aniang Kaduang Gerang Pangyatu, ampo ing rehimen nang
Sukarno ampong Suharto kaibat ning panaun ning pamaniakup, at luluban no ning
kasalesayan nang pangsarili ampong pambangsa deting obra na.

Neng kai, e ra la kapad deng kapanibalan da reng talasakup ampo reng tubung
kapamahalan a menalili kareti deng kasulatan nang Pramoedya. Dinalan ya king
censorship i Pramoedya kabang daragul ing kayang kasikatan king kilual ning
Indonesia kanitang panaun a e pa miliari ing pamagbayu (pre-reformation era).
Aniang minalis king rehimen nang Suharto, mirasan ya king pamanaliwa king
kabilian ning pulitica ampong pamipate-pate para king upaya king Indonesia.
Uling king paglalawe kayang antimong mitagan ibat king sadiang rehimen (lipat
ning linaban ya murin karela), dakal deng banuang nigse king isla ning Buru,
nung nu ro susukul deng presung pampulitica, at nung nu ne kinuentu ing
pikabaluan nang diling obra, ing Buru Quartet. King pamagsalita ya mu o kuentung
mirake kareng aliwang presu ing epicung iti, bayu ya misulat at pasalikut a
pepalual. Linaban ya i Toer kareng patakaran ning mumunang pamuntuk (i Sukarno)
ampo ing kayang kayalili, ing rehimen nang New Order (o Bayung Palakad) ning
Pamuntuk o Presidenti Suharto, dapot pinu at e halata ing kayang pamagpuna,
dapot masikan ing kayang pamalak laban king colonialismu ampong discriminaciun
basi king lahi (racism). Aniang dakal a banuang atiu king sukulan ampong
mekulung ya king kayang bale (house arrest), megi yang kilalang sagisag ning
katimawan ning pamipahayag ampo ning katulirang pantau.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norodom_Sihanouk

I Norodom Sihanouk (Khmer: នរោត្តម សីហនុ; 31 Octubre 1922 – 15 October 2012) ing
meging Ari ning Cambodia manibat 1941 anggang 1955, at pasibayu manibat 1993
anggang 2004. Ya ing tatalan upaya king Cambodia manibat 1953 anggang 1970.
Kaibat ning kadwa nang pamanabili king tronu anyang 2004, meyaus yang Ing
Ari-Ibpa ning Cambodia (The King-Father of Cambodia, Khmer: Preahmâhaviraksat),
metung a pusisyun nung nu mendatila/menatili la kaya deng dakal kareng
kapakibatan o resposibilidad na antimong konstitusyonal a ari.

Anak neng Ari Norodom Suramarit ampong Reyna Sisowath Kossamak, i Sihanouk, at
makanyan la karakal deng pusisyun a telan na manibat kanitang 1941, a agpang
king Guinness Book of World Records, ya ing pulitikung dakal dili tatalnan a
puestu king pulitika.}}[suglung a mepatad]</ref> Kayabe la kareti deng adwa
antimong ari, adwa antimong mayupayang prinsipi (sovereign prince), metung
antimong pamuntuk/presidenti, adwa antimong pun ministru, ampong dakal a
pusisyun antimong pekapun da reng miayaliwang governments-in-exile. Migsilbi
yang tutang He served as (puppet) a pekapun ning estadu (puppet head of state)
ning kapamahalang Khmer Rouge anyang 1975–1976.

Pang-dangalan ( honorific) la mû deng keraklan kareng pusisyun a reti, kayabe ne
ing tauli antimong konstitusyonal a ari ning Cambodia. Ing taganang panaun ning
epektibung pangalukluk nang Sihanouk king Cambodia milyari manibat anyang 9
Noviembre 1953, nung kapilan ne pigkalub ning Pransiya ing katimawan king
Cambodia, angga kanitang 18 Marzo 1970, nung kapilan leko neng Heneral Lon Nol
ampo ing Kapulungang Pambangsa and the (National Assembly) i Sihanouk.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Era_University

Ing New Era University (NEU) metung yang pipagaralan king Filipinas a palakad
ning Iglesia ni Cristo (INC). Atyu king # 9 Central Avenue, New Era, Quezon
Lakanbalen, king Central Office Complex ning INC. Atin yang mapilang sanga
kareng myayaliwang dake ning Filipinas, alimbawa king San Fernando Lakanbalen,
Pampanga, king Lipa Lakanbalen, Batangas, ampong General Santos Lakanbalen,
South Cotabato.

Mitatag ya kanitang Junio 17, 1975. New Era Educational Institute ing minuna
nang lagyu, at king Echague, Quiapo, Menila king Dalang Carlos Palanca ya anyang
purmeru. Anyang mumuna, secundariu (matas a pipagaralan o high school mu ing
yampang na, oneng meragul ya kanitang 1977, at mika cursu ya mu namang technical
ampong vocational lalam ning Center for Livelihood and Skills Training (CLST)
anyang meragul ya ketang 1977. Atin ne muring cursung graduadu (masteral ampong
doctoral).

Miyalilan yang lagyu king New Era College anyang kinilala neng colegiu ning
Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports (MECS) ketang 1981. Ketang Junio 1995,
miyalis ya king salukuyan nang lagyu, ing New Era University, anyang gewa neng
universidad ning Commission of Higher Education (CHED).

Anyang Mayo 10, 1986, biklat neng Eraño G. Manalo ing bayu at permanenting
campus ning New Era College king Dalang St. Joseph, Milton Hills Subdivision,
Diliman, Quezon Lakanbalen. Uli ning prublema king kataimikan ketang lugal ning
campus king Menila, miyalis la mu naman deng departamentung secundaria ampong
pamiturung e pormal (non-formal education) ketang bayung campus king Diliman.
Uli na niti, miyabe-yabe la reng eganaganang dake ning colegiu lalam ning bayung
gusaling maki apat a palapag o pisu.[1]



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nawaz_Sharif

I Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif (Urdu/Punjabi: نواز شریف, ágkas yang [nəˈʋaːz
ʃəˈriːf]; mibait 25 Diciembre 1949) metung yang pulitiku ampong negosyanting
Pakistani, a kaybat ning pamanyambut ning kayang partidu ketang alalan anyang 11
Mayo 2013, asahan deng magsilbi antimong tutuking Pun Ministru ning Pakistan, a
migsilbi na antimong kalabing adwa (12th) ampong kalabing apat (14th) a Pun
Ministru kareng adwang a mitutuking terminu manibat Noviembre 1990 anggang Julio
1993, at manibat Febrero 1997 anggang Octubre 1999. I Sharif ing Pamuntuk ning
Pakistan Muslim League-N, metung kareng pekamaragul king Pakistan. 's largest
political parties. Antimong makibandi ning Ittefaq Group, metung a manimunang
business conglomerate, metung ya mu naman kareng pekamakwaltang tau king
Pakistan.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/MySpace

Ing MySpace metung yang social networking website a maki interactive a ugnayan
da reng kaluguran a binie ning talagamit, adle (profile) da reng tau, blog,
grupu, letratu, tigtigan/musica, ampong video para kareng kayanakan ampong atiu
king edad. Ing kayang pun tanggapan (headquarters) atiu king Beverly Hills,
California, USA, nung nu ya pareu gusaling upisina king kayang derechung
makibandi, ing Fox Interactive Media; bandi ne iti ning News Corporation, a maki
pun tanggapan king New York Lakanbalen. Aniang Junio 2006, ing MySpace ing sikat
diling social networking site king America. Agpang king comScore, alagpusan ne
ning kayang ka-cumpitensia, ing Facebook, ing MySpace kanitang Abril 2008,
agpang kareng bisitang e mumulit (unique visitors). Atin yang 300 empleadu ing
cumpania at e na sasabian ing kayang panakitan o tubu a makakawani king News
Corporation. Melalang ya ing ka-100 miliun a account aniang Augostu 6, 2006 king
Netherlands at mekabilang yang manga 106 miliung account ing karinan o site
aniang Septiembri 8, 2006.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miriam_Makeba

I Miriam Makeba (4 Marzo 1932 – 9 Noviembre 2008), a maki palayong Mama Africa,
metung yang magkanta ampong aktibistang pang katulirang sibil (civil rights
activist) ibat Mauling Aprikang mirinan Grammy Award.

Anyang dekadang 1960s, ya ing mumunang magkantang ibat Africang magpasikat king
musikang Aprikanu king Estados Unidos ampo king mabiliug a yatu. Pikabalwan yang
dili para king kantang "Pata Pata", a mumuna rang gewang plaka anyang 1957 at
mipalwang king Estados Unidos anyang 1967. Ginawa yang plaka ampong mig-tour
kayabe la reng aliwang sikat a magkanta, antimo i Harry Belafonte, Paul Simon,
ampo ing sadya nang asawang i Hugh Masekela.

Aktibu yang mengampanya laban king sistema ning Mauling Aprikang apartheid. Uli
na niti, binawi ne ning kapamahalan ning Mauling Aprika ing kayang panga-memalen
(citizenship) ampo ing katuliran nang mibalik (right of return). Kaybat nang
milako ning apartheid, minuli ya. Mete ya kaybat ning ataki king pusu anyang 9
Noviembre 2008 kaybat nang linage king konsyertu ba neng suportan ing talasulat
a i Roberto Saviano ketang laban na king Camorra, metung a organisasyun o aguman
a kalupa ning mafia at lokal king labuad o rehiyon ning Campania.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miriam_Defensor_Santiago

I Miriam Defensor Santiago (mibait Miriam Palma Defensor anyang Junio 15, 1945)
metung yang mepiling Ukum ning International Criminal Court ampong kayanib ning
Senado ning Filipinas. Metung yang abogada, sadyang ukum, ampong propesor ning
leying pang-punbatas ampong leying internasional (constitutional law and
international law). Migsilbi yang Komisyonado ning Pamaglipat ampong Pamagpalwal
(Commissioner of the Bureau of Immigration and Deportation) anyang 1988, ampong
Kalihim ning Repormang Agraryo manibat and the Secretary of the Philippines'
Sakdalan ning Repormang Agraryo manibat 1989 anggang 1991. Ya ing talatátag
ampong kasalukuyang pekapun ning panglibutad-wanan a People's Reform Party a
ka-alyadu ning sadyang pamuntuk Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, at metung yang Laureado
ning Ramon Magsaysay Award para king serbisyong pangkapamahalan.

Tinagal ya para king katungkulan a Pamunuk ning Filipinas anyang 1992 i Defensor
Santiago;ya ing mumuna king pamamilang kareng botu kareng mumunang limang aldo,
oneng bandang tawli mesambut ya king pilatan a ala pang metung a milyung botu
kareng atlung pulu't anam a milyung (36,000,000) a botu. Sasabyan dang mika
maleparan a pirait king kampanya, at mika kapansin-pansin a blackout king
kuryenti kaybat da reng mumunang limang aldo. Minapag yang protesta, dapot
tebili re ini uli ning teknikalidad anyang tinagal ya at sinambut para king
pwestu king Senado.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mindanao

Ing Mindanao iya ing pangaduang pekamaragul at peka-aslagang pulu king Filipinas
at metung kareng atlung pulung aptas king bangsa, nung nu ing Luzon at Visayas
ilang aliwa pang adua. Ing labuad Mindanao mikarungut la keng Espanya inyang
pang 16 at pang17ng dilanwa nung nu deng sundalus a Kastila at ding kayang
frayle ilang sinakup kaniti inyang 1622.

Kasalungsungan ing labuad Minadanao karinan de reng Muslim na ning bangsa o
Moros a populasyun, a nung nu bubuu da reng dakal a katutubung grupu kalupa da
mo reng Maranaos at deng Tausug, at deng aliwa pang inaptas a tribung dang ausan
dang Lumad. Taliwas keng balu da reng keraklan, enaman eganaganang dake ning
Mindanao a sakup da reng Muslim. Ing tutu na niti, keraklan kareng dake ning
Pangulung Mindanao, Aslagang Mindanao at Mauling Mindanao deng tau keti maniwala
keng animism bayu la meging Binyagan.

Bilang pulu king mauling dake ning bangsa, ing Mindanao iya ing pangaduang
pekamaragul a pulu at atin yang 94,630 kilometru kudradu, kulang yang 10,000 km²
kalati keng Luzon. Ing pulu bulubundukin ya, at atiu ka rin ing Mount Apo, ing
peka matas diling bunduk king bangsa. King albugan ning pulung Mindanao iyapin
ing Dayat Malat ning Sulu, king aslagan ing Dayat Malat ning Filipinas at king
mauli ing Dayat Malat ning Celebes.

Ing pulung aptas ning Mindanao abe ne ing mismung pulung Mindanao, at dadag na
pa ing Kapuluang Sulu king maulingalbugan. Ing aptas a pulu makabangal yang anam
a labuad, nung nu pikawani ro pang 25 lalawigan.

Ding pulung aptas ning Mindanao ila ring sapunggul a pulu king mauling Filipinas
nung nu atin yang anam administratibung labuad. Dening labuad pibangal dalang
antimong 25ng lalawigan, nung nu ding apat ala lu king mismung pulung Mindanao.
Ding pulung aptas kayabe la ring Kapuluan Sulu king maulingalbugan, nung nu atin
yang aduang peka-pulu, ing Basilan, Jolo, at Tawi-Tawi, at dagdag pa ring king
kilual a pulu antimo ring king Camiguin, Dinagat, Siargao, Samal, at ding Pulung
Sarangani.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mimar_Sinan

I Koca Mi'mâr Sinân Âğâ (Ottoman Turkish: خواجه معمار سنان آغا; Modern Turkish:
Mimar Sinan, agkas yang [miːˈmaːɾ siˈnan]) (c. 1489/1490 – Julio 17, 1588 ing
pekapun a arkitektong Ottoman (Turkish: "Mimar") ampong inyerong sibil para
kareng sultan a Suleiman the Magnificent, Selim II, ampong Murad III. Ya ing
manibala king pamanikdo kareng maygit atlung dalan a istruktura ampong mas
malating proyekto, anti reng Islamic a pipagaralan a primerong eskuwela o
pipagararan (sibyan mekteb). Kaybat na niti, deng magsane kaya (apprentice)
idisenyu de ing Sultan Ahmed Mosque king Istanbul, at sumaup la king
pamagdisenyu king Taj Mahal king Imperyong Mughal.

Anak ne ning kateru o mason, a menigaral a teknikal, at meging inyerung militar.
Mabilis yang mitas ranggu, at mumuna, megi yang opisyal king militar at kaybat
metung a komandante o pekapun a Janissary, a maki titulung ağa. Digdagan na ing
kayang kasanayan king arkitektura ampong inhenyerya kabang mangitalakad
miyayaliwang klasing kuta, ampong proyektung impraskukturang militar antimong
dalan, tete, ampong aqueduct o istrukturang daralanan danum. Anyang manga edad
yang singkwenta, mituldu yang pekapun a arkitektu ning imperyu, pusisyun nung nu
no agamit deng gelingan nang teknikal a iwa na king militar king pamanikdong At
about the age of fifty, he was appointed as chief royal architect, applying the
technical skills he had acquired in the army to the "pamanikdo kareng
mangasanting a gusaling relihyosa" ampong eganaganang klasing istrukturang
sibiko. Halus lima yang pulung banwa king pwestung iti.

Ing obra maestra na yapin ing Selimiye Mosque king Edirne, dapot ing pekasikat
nang obra ya pin ing Suleiman Mosque king Istanbul. Ya ing manibala king
maleparan a sakdalan o departamentu ning kapamahalan, at dakal ya senayan a
kasaup a king kapanaunan da, peparangalan da ing sarili da, kayabe ya i Sedefkar
Mehmed Agha, ing arkitektu ning Sultan Ahmed Mosque. Tuturing deng pekamapyang
arkitektu ning panaun a klasikal ning arkitekturang Ottoman , at kinumpara de
kang Michelangelo, a kapanaun na king Albugan. Balu reng balu king Istanbul i
Michelangelo ampo reng kayang planu para king St. Peter's Basilica king Roma,
uling i Leonardo da Vinci meimbita ya anyang 1502 among 1505 ning Sublime Porte
a magsumiting planu para king tete king Golden Horn.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milo%C5%A1_Zeman

I Miloš Zeman (pangayagkas a Czech: [ˈmɪloʃ ˈzɛman] ( makiramdam); mibait 28
Setiembre 1944) metung yang Czech a pulitikung miyalal a katlung Pamuntuk ning
Republika ning Tseka anyang 2013. Ya ing mumunang miyalal Pamuntuk king
kasalesayan a Czech a miyalal king kabilugan ning bangsa. Bayu iti, migsilbi
yang Pun Ministru ning Republika ning Tseka manibat 1998 anggang 2002. Antimong
pekapun ning Czech Social Democratic Party anyang dekadang 1990, binayu ne ing
partidu at gewa neng metung kareng manimunang partidu ning bangsa. Migsilbi yang
Talapamuntuk ning Kamara ding Diputadu ning Republika ning Tseka, ing mababang
kapulungan ning parlamentong Czech, manibat 1996 anggang 1998.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Schumacher

Template:Infobox Le Mans driver I Michael Schumacher (Pangayagkas a Aleman:
[ˈmɪçaʔɛl ˈʃuːmaxɐ] ( makiramdam); mibait 3 Enero 1969) metung yang retiradung
Aleman a kareristang F1 a tuturing dang metung kareng mapyang dili king kabang
panaun. Dakal ya tatalnan a driver records, kayabe ya ing dakal dili kampeonato,
dakal dili pamanyambut king karera, pekamabilis a lap, pole positions ampong
dakal diling karera king metung a panaun o season – 13 anyang 2004. Anyang 2002
megi yang magdili-diling karerista king kasalesayan ning Formula One a mayari
kareng atlung pekamatas o top three ning balang karera ning metung a panaun, at
ligpusan ne murin ing record para king dakal diling podium finish.

Agpang king karinan-Aptas o website a Formula One, ya ing "mapyang diling
kareristang linto king pasiknangan a iti agpang king estadistika"
("statistically the greatest driver the sport has ever seen").

Ibat la ngan deng resulta da reng karera ampong kampeonato (1991–2006) king
Official Formula 1 Website. 1991 Season review onwards. www.formula1.com.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Haneke

I Michael Haneke (Pangayagkas a Aleman: [hɑːnɛkɛ]; mibait 23 Marzo 1942) metung
yang direkor pelikula ampong talasulat script a Austrian. Papalto no kareng
kayang pelikula deng prublema ampong kakulangan king makabayung sosyedad.
Megobra ne king telebisyon, teatro ampong pelikula i Haneke. Kilala ya murin
king pamagdiskursu tungkul kareng pisasabyang pangsosyedad king kayang obra.
Besides working as filmmaker he also teaches directing at the Filmacademy
Vienna.

Anyang 2009 Cannes Film Festival, simbut ne ning pelikula nang The White Ribbon
ing Palme d'Or para king pekamayap a pelikula (best film), at king 67th Golden
Globe Awards sinambut yang Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film.
King banwang 2012, minuna reng pepalage ing kayang pelikulang Love, a
mekipagkumpitensya ya iti king 2012 Cannes Film Festival. Ikwa nang sinambut
Palme d'Or niting pelikula, a meging kadwa nang pamanyambut king matas a uring
galal a iti kilub ning atlung banwa, at uli na niti, mibili ya king makabukud a
kategorya a bibilugan da reng pitu mû, kayabe la reng kalupa nang Francis Ford
Coppola. Ginawa neng pelikula kareng amanung Frances, Aleman ampong Ingles.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mediterranean_Dayat_Malat

Ing Mediterranean metung yang dayat malat ning Atlantic Ocean 'alus mabibilugan
yang gabun: king pangulu ing Europa, king mauli ing Africa, at king aslgan ing
Asia. Lulukuban na ing mga lualas a It 2.5 yutang km² (965,000 kd yu), dapot ing
kayang makatayid keng Atlantic (the Strait of Gibraltar) mga 14 km (9 mi) yamu
lapad. Keng oceanography, neng misan mayyaus yang Eurafrican Mediterranean Sea o
kaya ing European Mediterranean Sea para miayaliwa ya keng mediterranean dayat
malat karing aliwang lugal.

Ing katayang Mediterranean iabt ya keng Latin a katayang mediterraneus ing
kabaldugan na, "kalibudtan ning Yatu" (medius, "libutad" + terra, "gabun,
yatu"). Kareng menimumang Romans, ing Mediterranean iya ing kalibudtan ning
Yatu..

Ing Dayat Malat ning Mediterranean makatayid ya keng Atlantic Ocean kapmilatan
ning Strait ning Gibraltar kegn albugan ampong keng Dayat Malat ning Marmara
ampong Black Dayat Malat, keng Dardanelles at keng Bosporus mituttuki, keng
aslagan. Ing Dayat Malat ning Marmara mababali ya bilang dake ning Dayat Malat
ning, subali ing Bladk Dayat Malat aliya. Ing 163 km kaba ning gawang-taul a
Suez Canal king aulingaslgan tatayid ne ing Dayat Malat ning Mediterranean Sea
keng Malatung Dayat Malat.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mauling_Sudan

Ing Mauling Sudan (South Sudan), a maki opisyal a titulung (i/ˌsaʊθ suːˈdæn/ or
/suːˈdɑːn/), Republica ning Mauling Sudan (Republic of South Sudan) at bayu ita,
ausan dang Southern Sudan, metung yang bangsang makakulung-gabun (landlocked)
king aslagan-kalibudtang Africa a kayabe king United Nations subregion ning
Aslagang Africa (Eastern Africa). Ing Juba ing kasalungsungan nang tungku
(buntuk balen, kapitolyu o cabesera/kabisera), a ya mu namang pekamaragul nang
lakanbalen o ciudad. Balak deng yalis ing tungku nang lakanbalen (capital city)
king mas makalibutad a lugal, ing Ramciel, king paintungulan. Padurutan de ing
Mauling Sudan ning Ethiopia king aslagan, Kenya king mauli-aslagan, Uganda king
mauli, ing Democratic Republic of the Congo king mauli-albugan, ing Central
African Republic king albugan ampo ing Sudan king pangulu. Kayabe ya keti ing
maleparan a labuad a pinak ning ning Sudd, a lelangan ning White Nile at
mayayaus keting a Bahr al Jabal.

Dake na lang ning Ejiptu deng teritoryu ning Mauling Sudan ampong Sudan lalam
ning Muhammad Ali Dynasty, at kaybat penibalan da lang antimong Anglo-Egyptian
condominium o miyayabeng pamanibala ning Inglaterra o England ampong Ejiptu,
anggang mitimawa ya o migsarili ing Sudasn anyang 1956. Kaybat ning Mumunang
Gerang Sibil ning Sudan (First Sudanese Civil War), meyalkus ya o meporma ing
Southern Sudan Autonomous Region anyang 1972 at mindatila ya o menatili anggang
1983. Kaybat, milyari ing kadwang gerang sibil ning Sudan, at meyari iti king
Pangkabilugan a Pamikasundung Pangkaratunan (Comprehensive Peace Agreement) ning
of 2005. Mas tawli anyang banwang ita, misubli ing otonomiya o sariling
pamanibala ning mauli, anyang mebilug ya ing Autonomous Government of Southern
Sudan.

Megi yang timawang estadu ing Mauling Sudan anyang 9 Julio 2011, kaybat ning
metung a reperendum a mipasar kapamilatan ning 98.83% da reng botu. Metung yang
estadung kayanib da reng Misasanmetung a Bangsa (United Nations member state),
kayanib ning African Union, ampong estadung kayanib ning Intergovernmental
Authority on Development. Anyang Julio 2012, pinirma ya ing Mauling Sudan kareng
Geneva Conventions.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matsuo_Bash%C5%8D

I Matsuo Bashō (松尾 芭蕉?, 1644 – Noviembre 28, 1694), mibait yang Matsuo Kinsaku
(松尾 金作?), kaybat Matsuo Chūemon Munefusa (松尾 忠右衛門 宗房?), ing pekasikat a poeta o
watas ning Kapanaunang Edo king Hapon. Anyang mabye ya pa, kinilala re i Bashō
kareng obra na king saup-saup (collaborative) a pormang haikai no renga; ngeni,
kaybat da reng pilang siglu o dilanwa ning komentaryu, kikilalanan deng
panginwan o misnang gelingan king makuyad ampong malinong haiku. Sikat ya king
mabilug a yatu ing kayang poesya o kawatasan, at king Hapon, makabili la reng
dakal kayang kawatasan kareng monumentu ampong tradisyonal a lugal. Lipat ning
karapatdapat deng kikilalanan king Albugan i Bashō king kayang hokku, ya mismu,
paniwalan nang ing pekamasanting nang obra atyu king kayang pamanimuna ampong
pamakyabe king renku. Babanggit dang sinabi na, “Dakal kareng talatuki ku,
kasinggaling kong sumulat hokku. Papakit ku ing belwan ku kapamilatan ning
pamituglung-tuglung kareng bersung haikai.”

Anak ya pamu i Bashō, mipakilala na kaya ing poesiya, at kaybat nang milub king
eksenang intelektuwal ning Edo (a ngeni Tokyo), gad yang sinikat king mabilug a
Hapon. Menintunan ya antimong talaturu, dapot pepainggulutan na ing byeng sosyal
ampong urban (panglakanbalen) da reng sirkulo o pamiabe-abeng pangliteratura, at
maburi yang lumibut king marangle ampong ilang, papunta king albugan, aslagan,
ampo king kakewan ning pangulu, bang mika inspirasyun para king kayang panyulat.
Makalto kareng kayang kawatasan ing daretsu nang denasan king yatung makapadurut
kaya, at maralas, ararakap ne ing kapanamdaman ning metung a eksena o milyari
kilub da reng ditak a simpling sangkap.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magnus_Carlsen

I Sven Magnus Øen Carlsen (Norwegian: [sʋɛn mɑŋnʉs øːn kɑːɭsn̩]; mibait 30
Noviembre 1990) metung yang Noruego o Norwegian a chess grandmaster a yang
kasalungsungan a Kampeon ning Yatu king Ahedres o Chess ampong Mumuna king
ranggu king yatu. Ing pekamatas nang rating 2872 ya, ing pekamatas king
kasalesayan.

Anyang 26 April 2004, megi yang Carlsen Grandmaster king idad a
&&&&&&&&&&&&&&13.&&&&&013 years, Expression error: Unexpected <
operator..Expression error: Unexpected < operator.Expression error: Unrecognized
punctuation character "[". days i Carlsen, at uli na niti, ya ing meging kadwang
pekayanak a Grandmaster king kasalesayan, oneng manibat kanita, megi neng
katlung pekayanak. Kanitang Noviembre 2009 FIDE rating list ning Noviembre 2009,
atin yang Elo rating a 2801 i Carlsen, at megi yang kalimang talapamyalung a
mika rating a maygit king 2800; atin yang idad a

operator..Expression error: Unexpected < operator.Expression error: Unrecognized
punctuation character "[". days kanita, at yang pekayanak a menikwa king rating
a ita. Anyang 1 Enero 2010, king idad a &&&&&&&&&&&&&&19.&&&&&019 years,
Expression error: Unexpected < operator..Expression error: Unexpected <
operator.Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character "[". days, megi
yang pekayanak a talapamyalung chess king kasalesayan a mikaranggung mumuna king
yatu, anya ligpusan ne ing record a tatalnan nang Vladimir Kramnik, ampo ing
kapitung talapamyalung king kasalesayan a mikaranggung mumuna king yatu agpang
king pamagranggu ning FIDE. Kanitang FIDE rating list ning Enero 2013, miras
yang Elo rating a 2861 i Carlsen, at uli na niti, ligpusan ne ing rating record
nang Garry Kasparov a 2851 (a milyari anyang Julio 1999).

King listaan da reng ranggu anyang Enero 2013 ning FIDE, menikwa yang Elo rating
a 2861 i Carlsen, at ita ing pekamatas king kasalesayan kanita. Anyang Noviembre
2013, simbut neng Carlsen i Viswanathan Anand king World Chess Championship
2013, anya megi yang bayung kampeon ning yatu king ahedres o chess.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_adjectival_forms_of_place_names

The following is a partial list of adjectival forms of place names in English
and their demonymic equivalents, which denote the people or the inhabitants of
the places.

Note: Demonyms are given in plural forms. Singular forms simply remove the final
's' or, in the case of -ese endings, are the same as the plural forms. The
ending -men has feminine equivalent -women (e.g. an Irishman and a Scotswoman).
The French terminations -ois / ais serve as both the singular and plural
masculine; adding 'e' (-oise / aise) makes them singular feminine; 'es' (-oises
/ aises) makes them plural feminine. The Spanish termination "-o" usually
denotes the masculine and is normally changed to feminine by dropping the "-o"
and adding "-a". The plural forms are usually "-os" and "-as" respectively.

Adjectives ending -ish can be used as collective demonyms (e.g. the English, the
Cornish). So can those ending in -ch / -tch (e.g. the French, the Dutch)
provided they are pronounced with a 'ch' sound (e.g. the adjective Czech does
not qualify).

Where an adjective is a link, the link is to the language or dialect of the same
name. (Reference: Ethnologue, Languages of the World)

Many place-name adjectives and many demonyms refer also to various other things,
sometimes with and sometimes without one or more additional words. (Sometimes,
the use of one or more additional words is optional.) Notable examples are
cheeses, cat breeds, dog breeds, and horse breeds.

Ancient civilizations, former colonies, renamed countries and regions,
annexations, secessions, etc. Template:Adjectivals and demonyms for former
regions



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lasetas

Ing lasetas (king Ingles, switchblade, automatic knife, switch, o king British
English, flick knife) metung yang uring kutsiliung maki taram a tutuklip o
tatalusad neng titimid ya itang buton o baluat ketang talanan.

Legal lang sandata king America ampong Rusia deng lasetas, at panibalan do reng
leyi o batas—mipatupad la reti aniang panaun ning kapigaganakan kareng pahayagan
ampong pelikula tungkul king pamangamit da reng kutsiliu. Kapansin-pansin iti
kanitang dekadang 1950, aniang pepalage do reng pelikula anti ing The Wild One
kanitang 1954, Rebel Without a Cause ampong High School Confidential kanitang
1955, ampo ing drama king Broadway a West Side Story kanitang 1957, a tungkul
kareng kayanakan a magrebeldi, a keraklan gagamit lasetas. Kaibat dang mipalage
reti, mipatupad ya ing US Switchblade Act of 1958, at alus katuki ne ing UK
Restriction of Offensive Weapons Act 1959.

Neng kayi, magagamit ya ing katayang stiletto king America kareng lasetas nung
nu lulual ya ing taram king metung a danggut o sepu ning pulu o talanan.
Nanupata, e ya dapat apapagkamalian ing lasetas a bubuklat king tagiliran kareng
balisung, assisted-opening knife, o kaya itang stiletto a e bubusning dili na
(non-automatic stiletto).

Manibat kanitang dekadang 1930 anggang 1950, pulidu la pangawa king gamat deng
lasetas, at panintunan do reng kolektor. Ngening bandang tauli, tia-rakal da
nong gagawan deti, ania mas mura lang lalto deng lasetas, mas maimpis la
materialis, at e no makaing detaliadu pangagawa. Nanupata, atin pa muring
marakal-dakal a kumpania ampong taung gagawang pasadia kareng matas a uring
lasetas para king militar, emergency personnel (tauan a kailangan kareng e
asahan a pamikatagun), ampong manipun lasetas o knife collector. Kayabe la
kareng pikabaluan a gagauang automatic a lasetas deng Microtech Knives, Gerber
Legendary Blades, ProTech, Benchmade, Dalton, Boker/Magnum, Severtech, Spyderco,
ampong Piranha. Potang kayi, atin muring talagawang Italianung kilala kareng
klasikung istilong stiletto switchblade. Kayabe ya kareti i Frank Beltrame, ibat
king pamiliang lima nang pulung (50) banuang gagawang automatic, ampo ing AGA
Campolin, metung pang pamiliang maigit nang anam a pulung (60) banuang atiu king
negosiung iti.

Nanuman ing partikular a leying papaliari da, kareng bansang common law,
tuturing dong mapanganib a sandata (offensive weapons) deng lasetas, at bawal
lang pidala-dala king kilual a alang kapaintulutan o masikan a sangkan.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kateri_Tekakwitha

I Santa Kateri Tekakwitha (agkas yang[ˈgaderi degaˈgwit-ha] king Mohawk), a
mebinyag a Catherine Tekakwitha at maki bansag a Lily of the Mohawks (1656 –
April 17, 1680), metung yang santang Catolico, at metung a Algonquin–Mohawk a
birhen ampong relihyosang laiko. Mibait ya king Ngeni New York, akabyusan na ing
sakit a bulutung tutu (smallpox), meulila ya anyang anak ya pamu, at kaybat
mebinyag ya antimong Catolico at menuknangan ya anyang tawling banwa ning kayang
bye king misyon a nayun a Jesuit king nayun ning Kahnawake, king mauli ning
Montreal king New France, a ngeni Canada.

Maki pangaku yang pangabirhen angga king kayang kamatayan king edad a 24.
Mekilala ya king kayang birtud ning kalinisan puri, ing kayang penitensya king
kalamnan, ampo ing pangasakwil na king kayang tribu uli ning kayang
panga-kumbirti king Iglesia Catolica. Ya ing kapat a Katutubung Americanung
mirinan benerasyun king Iglesia Catolica (kaybat nang Juan Diego, ing Mexicanung
Indian da reng pamagpalto ning Virgen ning Guadalupe , ampo reng adwang Oaxacan
Indian). Bilalag neng beatang by Beato Papa Juan Pablo II anyang 1980, at
bilalag neng santang Papa Benedicto XVI king Saint Peter's Basilica anyang
Octubre 21, 2012. Miyayaliwa la reng milagru ampo makapagmulalang kapalyaryan a
bunga na kanu ning kayang pamamilatan

in Nancy Shoemaker, ed. Negotiators of Change: Historical Perspectives on Native
American Women (New York: Routledge, 1995), p. 49–71.

LORRAINE MALLINDER, "Holy Rivalry Over Kateri"], Montreal Gazette, 20 March 2010

Maid, Kateri Tekakwitha"] from April 23 1915 issue of the Recorder-Democrat a
semiweekly publication, Amsterdam, NY

birthplace] written by Jesuit Fr. Loyzance (the original purchaser of the land
at Auriesville) from St. Johnsville Enterprise and News November 28, 1934



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kapulungan_ding_Pekakatawan_ning_Filipinas

Ing Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan ning Filipinas (Ingles, House of Representatives
of the Philippines, Tagalug: Kapulungan ng mga Kinatawan ng Pilipinas; a kilala
murin king lagyu nang Castila, Camara de Representantes de Filipinas) ing
mababang kapulungan ning Kongreso ning Filipinas. Ing Senado ing matas a
kapulungan. Maralas, Kongreso ing aus da king Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan. Deng
kayanib na niti, ausan dong Congressmen (deng pekakatawan o kongresista), at ing
titulu da, Representative. Yalal da la deng pekakatawan king terminung atlung
banwa, at malyari lang miyalal pasibayu (reelected), oneng e la malyaring luluk
makatatlung tuki-tuking terminu. Manga walumpulung porsyentu (80%) da reng
congressmen, pekakatawan la kareng karelang distritu, magsilbing representanti
ning partikular a lugal. Ating 229 (adwang dalan adwang pulu't syam) a
distritung pang-alalan king bangsa, nung nu ing balang metung bibilugan de reng
250,000 (adwang dalan ampong limampulung libung) tau. Atin muring pekakatawan a
sektoral a miyayalal kapamilatan ning sistemang party-list, a bibilug king e
migit king adwang pulung porsyentu (20%) ning kabilugan a bilang da reng
Pekakatawan.

Bukud king kayang pamananggap o pamag-apruba king balang munikalang leyi o bill
ba yang ipasar at papirma king pamuntuk bayu ya maging leyi o batas, atin yang
upaya ing Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan a mag-impeach kareng mapilang opisyal, at
deng eganaganang munikalang leying maki kaugnayan king pisalapyan o kwalta
kaylangan lang manibat king mababang kapulungan.

Panibalan ne ning Talapagsalita, katungkulan a kasalukuyan nang tatalnan
Feliciano Belmonte, Jr. ning Quezon Lakanbalen. Ing opisyal a tanggapan ning
Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan atyu king Batasang Pambansa a atyu king Batasan
Hills king Quezon Lakanbalen king Metro Manila. Maralas, Batasan ing aus da king
gusali; ing kataya mengabaldugan ne mu namang Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan.

Philippines Template:Philippines topics



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kapampangan_Ku_Pagmaragul_Ku_(KKPK)_International_Inc.

Ing Kapampangan Ku Pagmaragul Ku (KKPK) International Inc. metung yang
non-profit Organization makabasi queng Pampanga. Mitatag ya niyang Septiembri
18, 2011 queng pamuntucan ng Jetlee Y. Tiongco. Ding KKPK Board of Directors,
Administrador, Advisers, Opisyalis at Miyembru macatucnang queng Pampanga,
Tarlac, Bataan at aliwang Bangsa.

Ing Pangunahing layunin ning KKPK para apisanmetung nala ding Kapampangan,
mamyeng serbisyu, Agricultura at Serbisyu para queng Calicasan. Siguraduan ing
ustung pamagbayu at pamanyulung. Queng plataporma ning KKPK regular dang gagawan
ing misyun at proyektu queng miyaliwang lugar ning Pampanga at aliwang lugar na
sasacupan ning Kapampangan queng miyaliwang actibidad. calupa ning pamamyeng
regalu careng Home For the Aged, Orphanage at careng Aeta’s, Clean up Dirve,
Tree Planting, Training Program, Feeding Program at pamamyeng vegetable
seedlings.

Ing Founder apin I Jetlee Y. Tiongco metung yang OFW queng Saudi Arabia,
2014-2015 Officers, cayantabe nala ding KKPK Advisers, Board of Trustees,
Fundraising Committee, Budget & Finance Committee, Projects Committee, Advisers
at Administrators.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaladua

Ing kaladua (soul king Ingles, alma king Castila) a kareng dakal a relihion,
tradicion a espiritual, ampong filosofia, ya pin ing dake ning metung a mabibie
a espiritual, at keraklan, alang angga, a maliaring mieng makakawani king
katawan, at makakawani king pisical a sangkap ning katawan. Keraklan, isipan
dang bibilugan ne ning kamalayan ampong personalidad, at maliaring kalupa ne
ning espiritu, kaisipan o sarili. Maralas, paniwalan dang mabie ya pa murin ing
kaladua kaibat ning pisical nang pangamate ning tau, at agpang kareng aliwang
relihion, maglalang yang kaladua ing Dios. Kareng mapilan a cultura, deng
mabibieng e tau, at neng kai, deng bage (antimo reng ilug) atin lang kaladua,
metung a paniwalang ausan dang animism.

Maralas, pililibe do reng katayang kaladua ampong espiritu, dapot itang tauli
mas makayatu ya ampong e makaing lalagpus (less transcendent) cumpara ketang
mumuna. Maliari la muring ituring a mipapareu deng katayang kaladua ampong
psyche, dapot ing psyche mas pisical ya kabaldugan, kabang ing kaladua mas
makaugne ya king metafisica ampong relihion.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jose_Rizal_University

Ing José Rizal University (JRU) metung yang privadung institucion yang alang
secta at non-stock. Mayayakit ya king Shaw Boulevard, Mandaluyong Lakanbalen,
Filipinas.

I Don Vicente Fabella (ing mumunang Certified Public Accountant a Filipinu) ing
mitatag king colegiu antimong Far Eastern College School of Accounts, Commerce
and Finance kanitang 1919. Miyalilan ya lagyu king José Rizal College (JRC)
ketang 1922 antimong kapigaganakan king bayaning pambansa ning Filipinas, i Dr.
José Rizal.

Anyang mumuna, atyu king Quiapo iting pipagaralan. Ala yang patugut babye
serviciu king pamanuru manibat ketang 1919 liban mu anyang Panaun da reng Japon
ketang Kadwang Gerang Pangkabilugan.

Megi yang universidad ing JRC ketang Octubre 2, 2000. Mirinan ya muring kabilyan
a deregulated kapamilatan ning Commission on Higher Education (Philippines).

Mikyabe ya ing Jose Rizal University king National Collegiate Athletic
Association kanitang 1927.

Kayabe la kareng miyari king JRU di Ramon Magsaysay a Pamuntuk ning Filipinas,
dang banquerung di Alfredo Antiporda ampo i Peter Kaw Sek, ding capitalistang
Bienvenido Tantoco (Rustan Corporation) at Luis Ongpin (Wolff and Company), ing
meging Kalihim ning Educacion, i Dr. Armand V. Fabella, ing broadcaster a i Joe
Taruc, ing filantrofong i Chester G. Babst, di Philip Cezar at Vergel Meneses a
most valuable player, ampo ing comedianting in Jimmy Santos, a meging campiun
king NCAA.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Dramani_Mahama

I John Dramani Mahama /məˈhɑːmə/ (mibait 29 Noviembre 1958) metung yang Ghanaian
a pulitikung Pamuntuk ning Ghana manibat anyang 2012. Megi yang Kadwang Pamuntuk
ning Ghana manibat 2009 anggang 2012, at linukluk ya antimong Pamuntuk anyang 24
Julio 2012 kamate ning kayang elilan, i Pamuntuk John Atta Mills. Miyalal yang
magsilbi king kayang mumunang terminu antimong pamuntuk anyang Diciembre 2012
kaybat ning taimik a alalan. Metung yang ekspertu king komunikasyon, matenakan
king amlat (historian), ampong talasulat. Migsilbi yang Kayanib ning Parlamento
(Member of Parliament) manibat 1997 anggang 2009; megi ya namang Ministru ning
Komunikasyon manibat 1998 anggang 2001.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Janet_Yellen

I Janet Louise Yellen (mibait Agosto 13, 1946) metung yang Americanang
ekonomista ampong propesor a mituldung Talapamuntuk who is the
(Chairwoman-designate) ning Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System,
nung nukarin ya ing kasalungsungan a Kadwang Talapamuntuk (Vice-Chair). Bayu
ita, ya ing Pamuntuk (President) ampong Chief Executive Officer ning Federal
Reserve Bank of San Francisco, Talapamuntuk ning White House Council of Economic
Advisersking lalam ning under Pamuntuk Bill Clinton, ampong Professor Emerita
king University of California, Berkeley Haas School of Business. Anyang Enero 6,
2014, kinumpirma ne ning Senado ning Estados Unidos ing kayang nominasyun bang
maging Talapamuntuk ning Federal Reserve Board of Governors; ya ing maging
mumunang babaing talan king posisyun.

https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indu_ning_Kapaldanan

Ing Indu ning Kapaldanan, o Virgen de los Remedios king Castila, ing titulu ning
Birhen Maria a inalkus ning Orden Trinitaria o Trinitarian Order, a mitátag
anyang tauling dake ning kalabing-adwang dilanwa o siglu. Miugne ya ing debosyon
king Reconquista ning Espanya, a mapali pa kanita. Anyang tutuking dilanwa,
mikalat ya kareng aliwang dake ning Europa. Anyang miglakbe ya ing Espanya king
Americas at sinakup kaniti, megi yang manimunang debosyon da reng Castilang
conquistador. Metung ya pa muring maleparan a debosyon king Espanya.

Anyang banwang 1952, mag-alsa la reng ortelanu ning Pampanga king lalam da reng
Huk, at sisikan ing sosyalismu ampong komunismu. Mikakalat ing kagulwan ampo ing
aliwang ideolohiya king lalawigan a baluarti ning Pisambang Catolicu.

King panaun a ita, tinalanga la reng Catolico ampo reng pekapun ning Pisamban
king Indu ning Dios. Tetag ne ning bayung tátag a Obispo ning San Fernando, i
Cesar Ma. Guerrero, ing Cruzada ning Pamanisi at Lugud, at bilalag neng Patrona
ning Pampanga ing Indu ning Kapaldanan o Virgen de los Remedios. Indam ne ing
imahe ning Birhen king Baliti, San Fernando, a opisyal a imahe ning Cruzada
kareng prusisyun.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holy_Angel_University

Ing Holy Angel University metung yang pribadung unibersidad a Catolicu king
Angeles Lakanbalen, Filipinas a miyayampang pamagaral a elementaria, secundaria
ampong colegiu. Metung ya kareng manimunang pipagaralan king bangsa ing HAU.
Titikdo na ing demokrasia at susuportan na ing mayap a pamanibala.

Kanitang banuang 1933, mitátag ya ing metung a eskuelang sekundaria kapamilatan
ning pamisaup na ning meangubie Arzobispo Pedro P. Santos, a cura parroco ning
Angeles ketang panaun a ita, at kaibat meging Arzobispo ning Nueva Caceres, ampo
i Don Juan D. Nepomuceno, metung a kilalang negosianti ning balen a ita.
Mipalagyuan yang “Holy Angel Academy” itang eskuela. Manimuna nang parasan niti
ing miyampang pamagaral a Catolicu king lebel a sekundaria, a king palage da
reng talatátag, yang kailangan ning balen kanitang panaun a ita. Uli na niti,
ing Holy Angel Academy ing meging mumunang pipagaralan a sekundariang Catolicu a
co-educational (panglalaki ampong pambabai) ning balen ning Angeles, Pampanga.
Mitátag ya antimong corporasiun a non-stock, non-profit a susuyu king komunidad.

Anyang 1948, mibuklat ya ing klasing pangbengi (evening session) ning high
school, a maki pakeng munye pamikatagun kareng magaral a magobra (working
student). Anya muring banuang ita, memusni lang departamentung tertiary deng
palakad king eskuela ba lang suyuan detang e maki agyung magaral king Menila.
Deng minuna nang dake niti ila pin deng College of Commerce, Junior Normal
College, ampong Liberal Arts

Kalabas da reng labing aduang banua, anyang 1960, mibuklat ya ing departamentung
elementaria uli ning alang patugut a pamakisabi da reng memalen. Miyampang yang
secretarial course a tunggal ampong tiduang banua anyang 1961. Antimong dalan
para king karagdagang pamandagul, mibuklat ya ing aduang banuang kursung
pre-engineering ketang 1962. E migluat, miragdagan la reti, at mika kumpletung
kursu king Civil, Electrical, Mechanical, ampong Industrial Management
Engineering

Uli ning akamtan na na niting institusion, mipaintulutan yang maging Holy Angel
College, nung nu i Don Juan Nepomuceno ing mumunang Pamuntuk. King lalam ning
kayang mayap a pamanibala ampo ing matenakan nang saup ning kayang anak, i G.
Geromin G. Nepomuceno, mika pamagbayu king palakad ning eskuela, a tinuki king
paralan ning pisalapyan (fiscal policy) a mibuklat dalan para king lalu pang
pamandagul ampong panyulung. Bagya bagyang milyari ing paninap a pakibatan ing
pamangailangan ning komunidad ampo ing mabilug a bangsa. Anyang 1965, mibusni ya
ing Graduate School of Education ba lang tayran deng talaturu king kareng
pamanalkus a propesional (professional growth). Katuki na niti, mika
Vocational/Technical Department a miyampang kursu king Electronics, Automotive
Mechanics, ampong Machine Shop Practice. Mitátag ya iti antimong pakibat king
Manpower Development Program ning bangsa.

Abitasa da reng talapanibala ing kabaldugan ning alang kapanteng pamandagul ning
kolehiyu, at aliwa ne mang lebel ing kareng penikuanan: ing panga unibersidad
ning Holy Angel College. Akamtan ne iti aniang Diciembre 4, 1981. I Engr.
Mamerto G. Nepomuceno ing meging mumunang pamuntuk ning unibersidad kanitang
Marzo 8, 1982. Ketang pamitagun a ita, bilalag neng Arzobispo Oscar V. Cruz ning
Arkidiosesis ning San Fernando ing Holy Angel University antimong metung a
unibersidad a Catolicu.

Anyang Agosto 12, 1985, i Sister Josefina G. Nepomuceno, OSB ing meging kaduang
pamuntuk ning unibersidad. Lalam ning kayang pamanibala, mirinan yang maragul a
ulaga ing aspetu nang propesional niting institutsion, at lalu yang mitimid ing
kayang kauriang Catolicu. Manibat 1985 anggang 1994, miragdag la reng kursung AB
major in Sociology ampong Religious Studies, ampo reng tiduang banuang programa
king Computer Science ampong Theater Arts, BSBA major in Small Business
Management/Entrepreneurship; BSED major in Values Education, PE, Health and
Music and Library Science; BS in Electronics and Communications Engineering,
ampong Associate courses in Computer Secretarial and Medical Secretarial. Deng
bayung yampang ning Graduate School ila pin deng MA in Education major in
College Teaching, English Teaching, Mathematics ampong Library Science. Manaya
la king paintulut ning DECS deng Ph.D. program in Management ampong Master’s
program in Public Administration.



https://pam.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Kissinger

I Henry Alfred Kissinger (mibait Mayo 27, 1923) mayayagkas /ˈkɪsɪndʒər/, metung
yang cientistang pampulitica, diplomaticu, ampong tinanggap king Nobel Peace
Prize a Americanung mibait king Alemania. Migsilbi ya antimong National Security
Advisor (Talausuk king Kapanatagang Pambansa) at kaibat, kayabe na niti,
antimong Secretary of State (Kalihim ning Estado) king Kapamahalang Nixon.
Kaibat ning kayang pamanungkulan, kukunan de pa murin deng pamuntuk o presidenti
ing kayang pamalak.

Metung yang talatuki ning Realpolitik i Kissinger, a dominanti papil king
patakaran nang panlual ning America manibat 1969 anggang 1977. Aniang panaun a
iti, ya ing misulung king patakaran ning détente, at penigobran ne ing metung a
pamitucnang-acbung (ceasefire) king Gerang Vietnam.

Angga ngeni, pupurian de i Kissinger deng kayang kayabe king profesion.. Mirinan
yang galal antimong mumunang tinanggap king Ewald von Kleist Award ning Munich
Conference on Security Policy (Pulung king Patakaran a Pangkapanatagan king
Munich), at magsilbi ya king salukuyan antimong talapamuntuk (chairman) ning
Kissinger Associates, metung a cumpaniang internacional king pamagunsulta
(international consulting firm). I Kissinger ing "most frequent visitor"
(pekamaralas a dalo) king George W. Bush White House antimong e oficial a
talausuk a pampulitica king Israel ampong Kalibudtang Aslagan (Middle
East)—kayabe ya ing pamaglusub ampong pamaniakup king Iraq.

align="center" rowspan="1"|Minuna kaya William P. Rogers |width="40%"
style="text-align: center;" rowspan="1"|United States Secretary of State
Migsilbi ya king Lalam nang: Richard Nixon and Gerald Ford 1973-1977
|width="30%" align="center" rowspan="1"| Menalili kaya Cyrus Vance |- |- !
